The Torah does not forbid a man from having multiple wives. Abraham, Jacob, David and Solomon are notable examples of biblical figures who wedded more than one wife. 

A close reading, however, reveals that in virtually all cases where our forefathers took multiple wives, it was for a specific reason. Abraham married Hagar only after Sarah suggested that he do so because she and Abraham had no children together. Another classic example is Jacob. He married Leah only because he was tricked into it by Laban. Similarly, he took Bilhah and Zilpah at the advice of his first two wives, who wished to bear children through them. 

Many in Israel argue that it is not outlawed by the ancient scriptures to have more than one wife and that this practice should be adopted if we are to advance as a nation. What shall our stance be, my $MONARCHTITLE$?

The Torah does not forbid a man from having multiple wives. Abraham, Jacob, David and Solomon are notable examples of biblical figures who wedded more than one wife. 

A close reading, however, reveals that in virtually all cases where our forefathers took multiple wives, it was for a specific reason. Abraham married Hagar only after Sarah suggested that he do so because she and Abraham had no children together. Another classic example is Jacob. He married Leah only because he was tricked into it by Laban. Similarly, he took Bilhah and Zilpah at the advice of his first two wives, who wished to bear children through them. 

Many in Israel argue that it is not outlawed by the ancient scriptures to have more than one wife and that this practice should be adopted if we are to advance as a nation. What shall our stance be, my $MONARCHTITLE$?

$COUNTRY$ is in dire need of a colony, and given our good standing with our friendly colonial powers, we are in position to purchase a most excellent place: Madagascar. An island in South-East Africa with the strangest fauna and an exotic native culture, though its hot climate might seem like a detriment for most people in our nation, our politicians, botanists and explorers alike are quite sure there shall be plenty of natural resources to exploit. Plus, if the deal to purchase Madagascar is successful, we can even use the place as a dumping ground for our surplus undesirables.

$FROMCOUNTRY$ has approached our government officials with quite a distinct proposition: The purchase of the Island of Madagascar. They are offering an estimated value of 1,000,000¤ for the whole island. And while this might seem like a great deal for us, we cannot forget the fact that we would be helping a rising Great Power consolidate itself as a possible competitor in the Colonizing stage.
Government officials have come back from $FROMCOUNTRY$ with great news! They have acceded to the sale of Madagascar!
Government officials have come back from $FROMCOUNTRY$ with great news! They have refused to sell Madagascar!
The mineral basin, located in the eponymous region, is very rich in coal and other useful minerals.

The Donbass, short for Donets Basin, is an area centered around the Donets River. Preliminary explorations have shown that this basin is one of the richest in the world. With billions of tonnes of coal to supply our nation for more the decades to come.

Preliminary explorations have shown the Central Ukrainian Mineral basin to be very rich in coal, iron and others. By investing a large sum of money, we can foment the extraction of these minerals whilst also attracting foreign investors. It must be done.

The Donbass, short for Donets Basin, is an area centered around the Donets River. Preliminary explorations have shown that this basin is one of the richest in the world. With billions of tonnes of coal to supply our nation for more the decades to come if we invest wisely by attracting foreign investors. It must be done.

The sloboda of Aleksandrovsk has grown exponentially in the last 30 years. By granting it proper recognition as a city, we can attract new settlers and investors alike which will cement out position in Taurida. One of the suggested names for its re-foundation is Melitopol, in honor of the old Greek ruins of Melita nearby.

Jacob Kettler, Duke of Courland from 1642 to 1682, engaged in several attempts at colonization, one of which was the land around the province of Banjul in the Gambia. The fledgling colony had many troubles until it was stolen by the Dutch and subsequently by the British, the French, Swedish and many others until it came back to British hands. As our standing and influences in the international community grows, we can now demand the masters of the Gambia to hand over their Gambian colony on the basis of the first ownership act. Our control of Courland-Semigallia allows us to lay claims on it. And if they do not hand it back, we would have a very valid casus belli against them. Alternatively, we could make them a nice offer of 250,000¤ for the whole colony and obtain it peacefully.

A $FROMCOUNTRY$ diplomat has recently approached us demanding we hand over the colony of Banjul in Gambia, on the basis of being its first owners, which dates all the way back to the 1650's. This is surprising as the area has been contested several times, but given our standing in the international stage we should be able to easily fend them off… Unless that is, they decide to use it as a casus belli to rip it off our hands. What shall we do?
Never! The Gambia has always been ours.
The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ have decided to hand over our rightful colony in the Gambia!
The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ diplomats state that the Gambia is and shall always be $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$

From 1654 to around 1689, the Island of Tobago of the Lesser Antilles belonged to the Colony of New Courland until a series of unfortunate events forced the Duchy to sell it to the British, who are to this very day the masters of the Island. Indeed ripping it off the hands of the British will be difficult, but we could obtain it by making a high enough offer… If not, we have a valid casus belli to make it ours once more. The story of Colony of New Courland is a sad one, but by placing it within our grasp once again we could amend the hardships the colonists suffered way back then. Though its climate might not be the best, as the island is located within the Atlantic Hurricane Belt, locals and botanists alike describe it as a "Tropical Paradise" when it's not being ravaged by storms.

$FROMCOUNTRY$ has approached our government officials with quite a distinct proposition: The purchase of the Island of Tobago. They are offering an estimated value of 100,000¤ for the whole island. And while this might seem like a great deal for us, we cannot forget the fact that we would be helping a rising Great Power consolidate itself as a possible competitor in the Colonizing stage.
Government officials have come back from $FROMCOUNTRY$ with great news! They have acceded to the sale of Tobago!
Government officials have come back from $FROMCOUNTRY$ with bad news! They have refused to sell Tobago!

Jacob Kettler, Duke of Courland from 1642 to 1682, engaged in several attempts at colonization, one of which was the land around the province of Banjul in the Gambia. The fledgling colony had many troubles until it was stolen by the Dutch and subsequently by the British, the French, Swedish and many others until it came back to British hands. As our standing and influences in the international community grows, we can now demand the masters of the Gambia to hand over their Gambian colony on the basis of the first ownership act. Our control of Courland-Semigallia allows us to lay claims on it. And if they do not hand it back, we would have a very valid casus belli against them. Alternatively, we could make them a nice offer of 250,000¤ for the whole colony and obtain it peacefully.
Demand it back, it IS still ours!

$FROMCOUNTRY$ has approached our government officials with quite a distinct proposition: The purchase of the Colony of Gambia. They are offering an estimated value of 150,000¤ for the whole colony. And while this might seem like a great deal for us, we cannot forget the fact that we would be helping a rising Great Power consolidate itself as a possible competitor in the Colonizing stage.
Government officials have come back from $FROMCOUNTRY$ with great news! They have acceded to the sale of the Colony of Gambia!
Government officials have come back from $FROMCOUNTRY$ with bad news! They have refused to sell the Colony of Gambia!

The time has come for the proper integration of all our conquered territories, consolidating our rule throughout the Island of Madagascar and better positioning ourselves for a final campaign against Antankarana to the north. It shall be done.

The Islands around Nosy Be have always been a safe haven for pirates, among other unlikeable characters, and it also seems to be the case for the people of Antankarana, who have now escaped to the islands around Nosy Be and re-formed their old polity. It is only a matter of time until they find a greater power to protect them, we should probably crush their rebellion as soon as we can before this happens…

The Antankarana -a tribal group from Madagascar- has recently found itself at war with the Merina Kingdom, the dominant power in the Island. Their aristocrats have approached our representatives in the colonies nearby with a proposition: That the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ become their protectors, expelling the Merina from their territories and their Boina allies, in exchange of the small, strategically-located archipelago of Nosy Be off the northwestern coast of Madagascar -which they control. Indeed it is quite an interesting proposition, as having a port on the Wester Madagascan Coast could serve us as a base of operations in the area. This, however, could hurt our relations with the Merina, as we shall become the suzerains of their lifelong enemies.
We have no time for this.
Indeed we must help the Antankarana.
Word has come to us that the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ has refused to help the Antankarana
The Antankarana have found themselves a new master, the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$!
An Ultimatum for the Merina Kingdom

Our Antankarana allies have pledged their allegiance to us, it is high time we take back their territories as well as freeing their Boina allies. An ultimatum shall be issued to Madagascar: Free our allies… or face dire consequences.
The perfidious Antankarana have allied themselves with the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$, who are demanding we hand over their territories, whilst also freeing the Boina Kingdom, or face dire consequences… war.
Very well, we shall do as they say.
An Ultimatum for the Merina Kingdom
The Merina Kingdom has acceded to free our allies, efficiently withdrawing their personnel from our allies' cores.
An Ultimatum for the Merina Kingdom
The Merina Kingdom has refused to free our allies!
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has declared war on us, we must prepare accordingly.

In their recent war with France, the Merina Kingdom of Madagascar has emerged victorious, managing to unite the island while also inflicting a humiliating defeat on its enemies, France especially! How will they ever recover?

In their recent war with France, the Merina Kingdom of Madagascar has emerged victorious, managing to unite the island while also inflicting a humiliating defeat on its enemies, France especially! How will they ever recover?
In their recent war with France, the Merina Kingdom of Madagascar has emerged victorious, managing to unite the island while also inflicting a humiliating defeat on its enemies.
The Merina Kingdom of Madagascar has emerged victorious against France and her allies.

In the year of our Lord $YEAR$, following the defeat of the Merina Kingdom, we hereby sign a treaty which shall relinquish the Nosy Be Archipelago, as well as formalizing out suzerainty and protectorates over the Kingdoms of Antankarana and Boina.

The Sultanate of Mahori was established in 1832 by Adriantsoly I, heir to the Madagascan Kingdom of Boina, who inherited the eponymous island after having ousted the previous Sultan, Bwana Kombo, who rewarded him part of his domain in the island. \n\nRavaged by constant pirate and slaver activity, as well as constant war with the neighboring Sultanates of the Comoros, being the sovereign of such Island is more of a curse than a blessing. The destiny of Mahori must be decided right here and now, lest one of the Petty Sultanates of the Comoros takes over, enslaving us as it is custom.

The Sultanate of Mahori was established in 1832 by Adriantsoly I, heir to the Madagascan Kingdom of Boina, who inherited the eponymous island after having ousted the previous Sultan, Bwana Kombo, who rewarded him part of his domain in the island. \n\nRavaged by constant pirate and slaver activity, as well as constant war with the neighboring Sultanates of the Comoros, being the sovereign of such Island is more of a curse than a blessing. The destiny of Mahori must be decided right here and now, lest one of the Petty Sultanates of the Comoros takes over, enslaving us as it is custom. Perhaps I could retire after this, send the kids to be schooled in the European Fashion while I'm living the good life.
Perhaps we should look for a buyer.

Word has come that one of the Sultans of the Comoros, Adriantsoly of Mahori, is willing to sell his home island to us, for the right price. Perhaps we should consider making an offer before someone else snaps it up? The land isn't worth much at the moment, as it is ravaged by pirates and slavers, but owning Mahori would be a boon to our prestige. The Sultan wants 30,000¤ for the Island, and wishes for his children to be educated in the "European Fashion" once the deal is struck.
We have received an offer from $FROMCOUNTRY$ to purchase Mahori. Should we accept?
I have changed my mind. Mahori is not for sale.
Sultan Adriantsoly has agreed to the sale. Mahori is ours!
The talks with Adriantsoly have broken down. He refuses to sell Mahori to us.

The Maria, an American Whaling Ship, has been captured by our Harbor Master after a petty squabble with one of its sailors. The Harbor Master is asking for the Sultan's permission to keep the American Crewmen as slaves as well as gifting the ship to his excellency.
They will make a fine addition.
Let them go, we want no trouble with America.

The Maria, an American Whaling Ship, has been captured by the Islanders of Johanna in the Comoros off the coast of Africa. The American Sailors have been enslaved and the ship has been dismantled by the local Sultan's Harbor Master... Luckily, there is an American Ship sailing nearby, the Dale, which can act under our permission. Several hardliners in the senate are calling for an Expedition to Johanna in order to free our citizens and extract reparations -of about 15,000¤- from the local Sultan.
We have no time for this.

Enraged by the enslavement of their nationals, Americans have sent a frigate to bombard our fortifications! They are demanding the immediate release of all American nationals and a payment of 15,000¤ as reparations for all damages. We have 24 hours to comply to their demands and in the case they are not met, the Americans are threatening with retaliation.
Then we must prepare for war!
Pay them at once! Tell them the Sultan is very sorry!

The Sultan of Johanna has refused to meet our demands, they are keeping the American Sailors in chains. The senate is furious, with some hardliners even suggesting the occupation and eventual pacification of the islanders!
Then we must fight for their freedom!
We have other matters to attend...
The Sultan of Johanna has somehow managed to meet our demands, the American Sailors are now free and safe.
The Americans have declared war on us and the enslaved sailors have somehow managed to escape!
The Americans have declared war on us and the enslaved sailors have somehow managed to escape!
The Americans have decided to forget about the enslaved sailors, citing it is in their best interest not to engage us in war.

Fianarantsoa, or the City of Good Education in Malagasy, has been proposed by the upper echelons of Malagasy society as Madagascar's first and foremost education centre. For this, an exquisite location atop of a hill in the Matsiatra province has been designated as the place where the City of Good Education shall be erected. All that remains is bringing foreign and local investors alike to lay the foundations of the future city.

The small town of Toliary has been proposed as a new commercial hub for the province of Menabe. Located near a natural harbor at the confluence of the Fiherena river, with proper funds the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Administration can turn Toliary into an important city in the region.

Mr. Lambert, naturalized $COUNTRY_ADJ$ citizen and avid entrepreneur, has been pushing for several reforms in the Merina Kingdom of Madagascar, the most notorious of which is the eponymous charter which gives $COUNTRY$ the exclusive right to exploit all minerals, forests and unoccupied land in Madagascar in exchange for a 10% royalty payable to the Merina monarchy. If the Malagasy accept these conditions, our influence in their court would vastly increase, pushing away any British interlopers.
An End to the Merina Monarchy

It is high time we lay claim on the Island of Madagascar before anyone else does. By establishing a protectorate over the Merina Kingdom, we can secure the whole island... And if the Merina refuse, we can always use force.

Mr. Lambert, naturalized $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ citizen and avid entrepreneur, has been of great influence in the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ court, up to the point of proposing several several reforms, the most notorious of which is the eponymous charter which gives $COUNTRY$ the exclusive right to exploit all minerals, forests and unoccupied land in Madagascar in exchange for a 10% royalty for us. If we accept his proposal, $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ influence in our court would vastly increase but likewise will our local industry and relations with them.
Very well, it must be done.
Absolutely not. All of Madagascar is Hallowed Ground.
The Malagasy have accepted Mr. Lambert's Charter!
The Malagasy have kicked out Mr. Lambert from the court, stating that all of Madagascar is Hallowed Grounds.
A Great Power is helping us modernize the nation.
It is high time we establish protectorates over the Malagasy Kingdoms in our sphere of influence. And if the Malagasy refuse, we can always use force.

Our Sphere Leader has been encouraging us to adopt their religion, which they deem to be the true faith. While this won't be very well received by our populace, it would surely become handy when dealing with other modern nations. It is high time to burn all the Royal Sampy Talismans in public display as to signify the beginning of a new era.
Now that we have taken possession of Comoros as a colony, we should reorganize its structure to make it truly part of our greater colonial administration.
Now that we have taken possession of Grand Comoro, we should reorganize its structure to make it truly part of our greater colonial administration.
The City of Good Education, a cultural center for Madagascar.

With the construction of the Suez Canal, the produce of $PROVINCENAME$ is deemed unprofitable. Thus, landowners all across the province have reunited in order to decide what shall the new plantations produce.
It is high time we establish protectorates over the Comorian Sultanates in our sphere of influence. And if the Comorians refuse, we can always use force.

Given Madagascar's lack of infrastructure, local methods of production have proved unfeasible if we wish to profit from the land. For this reason, new methods must be introduced along with new -and more profitable- kinds of crops suited for the local climate.

Given Madagascar's lack of infrastructure, local methods of production have proved unfeasible if we wish to profit from the land. For this reason, new methods must be introduced along with new -and more profitable- kinds of crops suited for the local climate.
Keep the local production close to the original.
Introduce Tea to the local farmers.
Introduce Cotton to the local farmers.
Introduce Coffee to the local farmers.
Introduce Tobacco to the local farmers.
Introduce Sugar to the local farmers.
Introduce all kinds of spices to the local farmers.
Introduce cocoa to the local farmers.

Jean Laborde, a French national currently residing in Antananarivo, has recently visited the Merina Court in search for sponsorship. Being a more than capable Engineer, he excels in the fields of metal casting, smithing, gun smithing and general production of goods such as cement, glass and explosives. He could become quite the asset for our nation if we were to hire him as our Chief Engineer... Although he demands quite the hefty payment for his services, Mr. Laborde assures his skill and knowledge is unmatched by anyone in the Island of Madagascar.

Norwegian Lutheran missionary T.G. Rosaas has presented a unique plan to build a new city in the province of Vakinankaratra: Antsirabe, or "the place of much salt" in Malagasy, which will serve as a retreat centre, spa and hospital for the sickly due to it's mild climate and the healing properties of its hot springs. This proposal has attracted many investors who are waiting to start the foundation of this city once the Aristocracy designates enough funding.
This city is famous for its sanitorium and spa as well as its mild climate.

Located in the Mozambique Channel off the coast of Madagascar, the Nosy Be Archipelago forms a group of several islands of which Nosy Be, or "Big Island", is the most densely inhabited one. The islands would be an ideal place for a coaling station for our ships coming and going from Southern and Eastern Africa, as well as India and Arabia.
By pen or sword, the Sultanates of the Comoros shall come under our rule, unifying our archipelago once and for all.
Mouvement de Décolonisation et d'Émancipation Sociale
Etat Démocratique Socialiste Libre de Guyane

It is true that $COUNTRY$ shares a very tumultuous history with Poland, but despite our differences and the many revolts they have caused, never mind the oppression they suffered after said unrest, Poles have proven themselves to be very useful subjects to our nation. So, in an attempt to mend past misdeeds and to quell the rising sentiments of Pan Slavism, here in the Polish Integration Act is proposed that all Poles, along with their language, customs and religion, become an integral part of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ nation, for our mutual benefit and for the preservation of all Slavic peoples.

In the lands of Transcaucasia live the Armenian people, hardy Christian folk who have resisted the constant onslaught of the Ottomans and Persians since time immemorial. It is for this reason they see us $COUNTRY_ADJ$s not as conquerors, but as liberators, for we stopped the despicable transgressions committed against their people and it is also for this very reason that the Armenian Integration Act proposes granting full $COUNTRY_ADJ$ citizenship to all its Armenian subjects as their loyalty is unshakable and their numbers are great enough to justify future expeditions into their ancient homelands, which are currently under the hegemony of the Turks.

The Georgians who inhabit Transcaucasia have proven themselves to be very loyal subjects of $COUNTRY$, almost willingly accepting our suzerainty whilst their nobility quickly integrated into our society. Indeed they are invaluable assets in exercising control over Transcaucasia as they see us not as conquerors, but as saviors and liberators from Persian and Ottoman hegemony. It is for this very reason that the Georgian Integration Act proposes granting all Georgian subjects full $COUNTRY_ADJ$ citizenship, as well as the protection of their language and culture as an integral part of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ nation.
A Call to arms in the Kingdom of Poland

Hankered after the semi-autonomous status they had enjoyed before the Cadet Revolution of 1831 and encouraged by the success of the Italian independence movement, the Polish szlachta, urban bourgeois circles and youths alike urgently desired the same outcome: To take the reins of their own nation and to be the masters of their own destiny. For that very reason an underground government has been formed in $COUNTRY$, it is no secret, not even for the Tsar in Russia, that Polish Nationalism is on the rise once more. 
Constant demonstrations on the streets of main urban centers, repression from the Russian Authorities and an odd amity between nobles and peasants alike has made our overlords ever the more apprehensive, and with reason… 

Rise up, Polish Brothers, for Poland is not yet lost!
A Call to arms in the Free City of Krakow

In the nominally-independent Free City of Krakow, the szlachta and middle class alike have grown nostalgic for the days of yore when the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth was whole, longing for the full restoration of Polish independence. Thus, fueled by activists in exile and former émigrés, talks of a partition-wide uprising have taken hold on almost every household… Inspired by the French Revolution and citing clauses of the recently-published “Manifesto of the Polish Nation”, demonstrators have taken to the streets of Krakow demanding for universal suffrage an end to serfdom. By including our support to these demonstrators, we could only hope to spark a partition-wide revolt on the former territories of Poland. \n\nRise up, Polish Brothers, for Poland is not yet lost!

In the nominally-independent Free City of Krakow, the szlachta and middle class alike have grown nostalgic for the days of yore when the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth was whole, longing for the full restoration of Polish independence. Thus, fueled by activists in exile and former émigrés, talks of a partition-wide uprising have taken hold on almost every household… Inspired by the French Revolution and citing clauses of the recently-published “Manifesto of the Polish Nation”, demonstrators have taken to the streets of Krakow demanding for universal suffrage an end to serfdom.

In the Free City of Krakow, the szlachta and middle class alike have grown nostalgic for the days of yore when the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth was whole. Thus, Inspired by the French Revolution and citing clauses of the recently-published “Manifesto of the Polish Nation”, demonstrators have taken to the streets of Krakow demanding for universal suffrage an end to serfdom.

In the Free City of Krakow, the szlachta and middle class, Inspired by the French Revolution and citing clauses of the recently-published “Manifesto of the Polish Nation”, have taken to the streets of Krakow demanding for universal suffrage an end to serfdom in hopes of sparking a partition-wide uprising.
In light of the recent events, $FROMCOUNTRY$ has decided to forge an alliance with the Poles in their endeavors against their oppressors.
In light of the recent events, $FROMCOUNTRY$ has decided to denounce their oppressors, but hasn't taken any further actions.
In light of the recent events, $FROMCOUNTRY$ has decided to stay neutral in the matter concerning the Polish Revolts.
In light of the recent events, $FROMCOUNTRY$ has decided to support their oppressors in their endeavors against the Polish Revolutionaries.
Word has reached us that the Poles have been organizing a revolt against our rule. Aided by émigrés from France, they are beginning to organize in the city of Posen right now.

A demonstration in the city of Posen, in the Grand Duchy of Posen, soon turned sour when the Polish-run "Polish National Committee" went from demanding autonomy for the Poles and reconciliation among the Poles, Germans and Jews, to restrict its membership to Poles only in a move to maintain supremacy within their own organization. Days later, an opposing "German Committee" was formed, which was largely influenced by German public officials loyal to the Prussian King and disgruntled Jews expelled from the Polish Committee… Soon enough the breakdown of Prussian authority allowed long-simmering resentments to explode: Polish nobility and peasantry took up arms, preparing for confrontation with the Prussian Army which was sent to quell the protests, Prussian symbols were torn down, and in a couple of places, fighting erupted with German colonists all across the Grand Duchy.

A demonstration in the city of Posen soon turned sour when the Polish-run "Polish National Committee" went from demanding autonomy for the Poles and reconciliation among the Poles, Germans and Jews, to restrict its membership to Poles only in a move to maintain supremacy within their own organization. Days later, an opposing "German Committee" was formed, which was largely influenced by German public officials loyal to the Prussian King and disgruntled Jews expelled from the Polish Committee… Soon enough the breakdown of Prussian authority allowed long-simmering resentments to explode: Polish nobility and peasantry took up arms, preparing for confrontation with the Prussian Army which was sent to quell the protests, Prussian symbols were torn down, and in a couple of places, fighting erupted with German colonists all across the Grand Duchy.

A demonstration in the Grand Duchy of Posen soon turned sour when the Polish-run "Polish National Committee" went from demanding autonomy for the Poles and reconciliation among the Poles, Germans and Jews, to restrict its membership to Poles only in a move to maintain supremacy within their own organization. Soon enough the breakdown of Prussian authority allowed long-simmering resentments to explode: Polish nobility and peasantry took up arms, preparing for confrontation with the Prussian Army which was sent to quell the protests.

A demonstration in the Grand Duchy of Posen soon turned sour when the Polish-run "Polish National Committee" went from demanding autonomy for the Poles and reconciliation among the Poles, Germans and Jews, to restrict its membership to Poles only. The breakdown of Prussian authority in the demonstrations allowed for long-simmering resentments to explode: Polish nobility and peasantry took up arms against the Prussians.

Poles in Greater and Lesser Poland and Galicia, together with some other nationalities in the territory of the former Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth, started a general uprising against the governments ruling their partitions. There is an outcry from some sectors of our population to support Polish freedom, but there wouldn't be any problems if we stayed neutral on this matter either.
Condemn the actions of the Great Powers holding the Polish Partitions.
Pronounce our support to the Great Powers holding the Polish Partitions.

Ludwik Mieroslawski, the insurrection general, and about two-thousand other members of the Polish Insurrection were apprehended by $COUNTRY_ADJ$ troops and imprisoned in Berlin-Moabit. In the course of the war several battles and skirmishes were fought and some seven hundred Poles were killed. The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ $MONARCHTITLE$ passed laws and edicts to make the land an integral part of $COUNTRY$'s territory and all that remains now is to decide the fate of the rebels.
Allow the Polish National Committee to take over the Great Uprising.

Originally created during the Greater Poland Uprising in the Grand Duchy of Posen, the Committee was to serve as a legal organization representing Polish interests in negotiations with the Kingdom of Prussia… But as the revolution has spread across all Partitions, it is high time we rescind control to a single entity ruling a single country: The New Polish Nation.

As the war rages on, our top politicians have decided to request for both diplomatic and logistical aid to several Great Powers, whoever responds positively to our cause shall stand with us. With any luck, we'll find ourselves an ally amongst them.

As the war rages on, our top politicians have decided to request for both diplomatic and logistical aid to several Great Powers, whoever responds positively to our cause shall stand with us. With any luck, we'll find ourselves an ally amongst them.
The Polish National Committee takes over the Great Polish Uprising!

Originally created during the Greater Poland Uprising in the Grand Duchy of Posen, the Committee was to serve as a legal organization representing Polish interests in negotiations with the Kingdom of Prussia… But as the uprisings have spread across all Partitions, they have rescinded control to a single entity which will be the interim rulers of the New Polish Nation.

Widespread uprisings in the former Kingdom of Poland are proof enough that the Poles will not submit to foreign authority. Russia, Austria and Prussia’s hold on the Polish Partitions is weakening and this threatens to upset the entire balance of power between these three Great Powers as it will inevitably end in conflict for all parties involved. Many in the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government feel that it falls on us to call the powers of Europe together and negotiate a settlement that will restore some semblance of stability to the area.

Now that plans for the conference in $CAPITAL$ are underway, $COUNTRY_ADJ$ statesmen are busy trying to determine what our stance on the issue should be. Some feel we should favor relinquishing some territories to the Polish National Committee, as not to upset the balance between the great powers as much as undoing the partitions on the Kingdom of Poland. This could potentially lower our relations with the Great Powers nonetheless. Others believe undoing the Partitions on the Kingdom of Poland should be the priority, even though this might come at the expense of the Great Powers involved who will surely not be pleased.
A smaller Poland would be most prudent.
Undoing the Partitions of Poland is paramount.

We have received word from the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ that they intend to hold a congress of European powers in their capital to discuss the ability of $COUNTRY$ to maintain stability in its partition of Poland. Some feel this is a veiled attempt to carve up our nation, and an insult, but regardless we cannot let the congress go on without our attendance. We shall see what manner of 'negotiation' $FROMCOUNTRY$ intends.

We have received word from the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ that they intend to hold a congress of European powers in their capital to discuss the ability of Russia, Prussia and Austria to maintain stability in the Polish Partitions. Some feel this is a veiled attempt to balk Polish 'aggression'. Either way, we cannot let the congress go on without our attendance. We shall see what manner of 'negotiation' $FROMCOUNTRY$ intends.

We have received word from the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ that they intend to hold a congress of European powers in their capital to discuss the ability of discuss the ability of Russia, Prussia and Austria to maintain stability in their partitions of Poland. Some feel we should favor relinquishing some territories to the Polish National Committee, as not to upset the balance between the great powers as much as undoing the partitions on the Kingdom of Poland. This could potentially lower our relations with the Great Powers nonetheless. Others believe undoing the Partitions on the Kingdom of Poland should be the priority, even though this might come at the expense of the Great Powers involved who will surely not be pleased. Still, others feel we should not take part in this veiled attempt at dismembering sovereign nations.
We will not risk our relationship with Russia, Prussia and Austria for this.
The Congress of $CAPITAL$: Liberate some parts of Poland.

The great powers of Europe joined together in $CAPITAL$ to negotiate the future of Poland. While there was much contention, ultimately it was decided that some parts of Poland were to be liberated, and any demands placed on Russia, Prussia and Austria should not weaken their interests unduly. Few of the attendees were pleased and even though the Congress favored Russia, Prussia and Austria it remains to be seen whether they will bow to pressure and uphold the Congress's edict.
This is how it must be.
The Congress of $CAPITAL$: Liberate most of the Historical Kingdom of  Poland.

The great powers of Europe joined together in $CAPITAL$ to negotiate the future of Poland, with delegates from Russia, Prussia and Austria also in attendance. While there was much contention, ultimately it was decided that creating stability in the region was best even if it came at the expense of the Empire's power. The Polish delegates were pleased, but Russian, Prussian and Austrian delegates left in a rage. It remains to be seen whether they will bow before the Congress's demands.

Our delegates have returned from the Congress in $FROMCOUNTRY$ with mixed news: though the consensus reached was that $COUNTRY$ needed to be kept strong, they still placed numerous demands upon us that would see the political map of Eastern Europe rearranged. If we choose to defy their edict, we could be facing wars from many fronts.
We will abide by their demands.
Never! $COUNTRY$ will not be ordered about!

Our delegates have returned from the Congress in $FROMCOUNTRY$ with disheartening news: despite considerable dissension among those attending, a consensus was reached that undoing the Polish Partitions is more important than $COUNTRY_ADJ$ interests and sovereignty. The demands are humiliating, and will see us losing much of our territories if we agree. If we defy the Congress, however, we could be facing war from many fronts.

$FROMCOUNTRY$ has sent word to the great powers that they will abide by the decrees of the Congress. This proves to the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government they are serious about working with the rest of Europe to maintain stability.

$FROMCOUNTRY$ has sent word to the European powers that it will abide by the decrees of the Congress. This proves to the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government they are serious about working with the rest of Europe to maintain stability, though it is clear they are angered by the results.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has decreed that it will not abide by the demands of the Congress. The Treaty, they say, is so much worthless paper, and they refuse to give up any of their sovereignty.
We have no desire to push this further.

An idea has arisen within the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government: could we perhaps offer our support to the Poles in the upcoming Congress, in exchange for placing a Habsburg on their throne? Our support could make a great deal of difference for them… and having a Habsburg on their throne could help us diplomatically when dealing with the Poles, after all, they could use all the support they can get. Archduke Karl Ferdinand Habsburg of Austria the second son of Archduke Charles, Duke of Teschen and Princess Henrietta of Nassau-Weilburg is the best option we have. He is unmarried and has shown sympathy for the Poles in several occasions!
We have no interest in this.

The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ government has approached us with a proposal: they will lend their support to us in the upcoming Congress, in exchange of placing one of their own nobles, a Habsburg, as the absolute ruler of Poland. While some might consider the offer an insult there are others who suggest that without this offer it's just as likely our country will not be supported in the congress and we could use all the allies in the Congress we can get. In any case, the candidate for the Polish Throne is Archduke Karl Ferdinand Habsburg of Austria, an upstanding man who is unmarried and has shown sympathy for the Polish Cause on several occasions… He is currently studying to become a Field Marshal of the Austrian Army and… Just between us… He has no physical deformities or disabilities that are quite characteristic of some Habsburgs.
No. Poland is not a bargaining chip.
The Poles have agreed to place a Habsburg on their throne. Now we just need to make sure that we do all we can to make sure the Poles are kept strong…
The Poles have refused our offer. Evidently they will take their chances.
Then they shall receive no support from us whatsoever.
We are called upon to live up to our part of the bargain and give up Galicia-Lodomeria.
We will abide by our agreement.

$FROMCOUNTRY$ has agreed to live up to its part of the bargain and hand over Galicia-Lodomeria to us. Archduke Karl Ferdinand Habsburg of Austria is eager to begin his reign as King Karol I of Poland.
Excellent, we will abide by our agreement.
Their help was worthless! Forget it!
The treacherous poles have refused their end of the bargain, labeling our help as worthless… This cannot stand without consequences!
We shall get to them in due time…

The great powers of Europe joined together in $CAPITAL$ to negotiate the future of Poland. While there was much contention, ultimately it was decided that the proposition had to be completely rejected and the topic forbidden to be mentioned in future congresses. Few of the attendees were pleased and even though the Congress favored the Russia, Prussia and Austria, it could not escape the influence of said Great Powers.

Our delegates have returned from the Congress in $FROMCOUNTRY$ with great news: though the consensus reached was that $COUNTRY$ needed to be kept strong, we managed to stop any demands would see the political map of Eastern Europe rearranged by exerting our influence on the attendants. The proposition was completely vetoed and forbidden to be brought up in any future congresses.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has exerted all of its influence in the Congress, which managed to make the greater majority of the attendants sign a veto against the proposition of a free Poland.
We are now the Masters of Galicia-Lodomeria
The Polish National Committee calls for union!

Originally created during the Greater Poland Uprising in the Grand Duchy of Posen, the Committee was to serve as a legal organization representing Polish interests in negotiations with the Kingdom of Prussia… But as the Polish Revolution has begun spreading across all Partitions of Poland, every revolutionary faction has accorded to relinquish the absolute control of their political and military matters to a single entity: The Polish National Committee.

The Szlachta has finally brought up an issue which made every Russian Ambassador most uncomfortable… The Irredentist Claims of our progenitors, those of the Commonwealth of old. We must reclaim our old territories if we wish for our nation to move forward!

The Szlachta has finally brought up an issue which made every Russian Ambassador most uncomfortable… The Irredentist Claims of our progenitors, those of the Commonwealth of old. We must reclaim these territories of old if we wish for our nation to move forward! Finally a grand Habsburg Nation rivaling Austria!

In the old commonwealth, the First Union of Horodlo served as a major step in the modernization and Europeanization of Lithuania, which gave them equal rights to Poles and marked the beginning of the Commonwealth Proper. A Second Union was proclaimed by the Congress Poland rebels in an earlier revolution and was to be based on the three nations of Poland, Lithuania and Ruthenia… Sadly, as Polish furor and nationalism took over upon liberation, talks of this second union have been suspended until now… Several Ruthenian nobles have called for a Third Union of Horodlo - citing the last revolution of Congress Poland, along with the rising Ruthenian Nationalism free from Russian oppression - to grant Ruthenian a status equal to Poles and Lithuanians by elevating the Ruthenian Nation, as a Grand Duchy, in full membership with the current Commonwealth.

With the completion of the Megali Idea, the glorious Greek state is once again strong in the world's view. Perhaps this prestige and legitimacy could be used for yet another demonstration of shameless irredentism… Our Greek brothers living abroad in the Balkans and the Pontus have grown restless, desiring unification to form an even Greater Greece!

With the completion of the Megali Idea, the glorious Greek state is once again strong in the world's view. Perhaps this prestige and legitimacy could be used for yet another demonstration of shameless irredentism… Our Greek brothers living abroad in Northern Thrace have grown restless, desiring unification to form an even Greater Greece!

Perhaps this prestige and legitimacy could be used for yet another demonstration of shameless irredentism… Our Greek brothers living abroad in Ikonion have grown restless, desiring unification to form an even Greater Greece!

Our nation will never survive on its own. It's time to unite with our Greek brothers.

Árbanon, or Albania, was a Medieval principality under the suzerainty of the Eastern Roman Empire and as such, it should be under rightful Greek suzerainty once again. While its inhabitants might be displeased about becoming our subjects once more, our top statesmen argue that the area will be much better under Greek management.

Megále Hellás, or Magna Græcia, were the original Greek colonies in the southern part of Italy and the island of Sicily. For hundreds of years, the area was under Greek influence, and even today can this influence be seen in the culture of Sicilians and South Italians. There are many Greeks living in the area as well, a remainder of Medieval Greek occupation, and from the many migrations our people underwent in order to get away from the Turkish yoke. With the use of an elaborate propaganda machine, as well as cunning diplomacy, we might be able to convince the international community of our legitimate claims in the area. However, the Italians might not like this, and they shall do whatever it takes to keep their precious territories.
Claim Bulgaria and the Danube Delta.

As Bulgarians became our rightful subjects once again, concerns have been raised among their community about the possibility of claiming the rest of their territories, as well as the area known as Dobrudja, which they also inhabit. The validity of their claims is fairly strong… even still some members of the international community might be reluctant to accept them.

The Western Balkans, once part of the Basileia Rhomaion, or the Greek name for the Eastern Roman Empire, should be part of our territories. As the successor state of this ancient and proud Empire, it is our duty to reclaim our rightful lands. Though many will object our claims, in the end our Cosmopolitan Empire shall prevail against all odds.

The Northern Adriatic Coast, once part of the Basileia Rhomaion, or the Greek name for the Eastern Roman Empire, should be part of our territories. As the successor state of this ancient and proud Empire, it is our duty to reclaim our rightful lands. Though many will object our claims, in the end our Cosmopolitan Empire shall prevail against all odds.

As Armenians became our rightful subjects once again, concerns have been raised among their community about the possibility of claiming the rest of their Anatolian territories. Once upon a time these territories were also Greek, so the validity of these claims is fairly strong… even still, some members of the international community might be reluctant to accept them.

Éfxeinos Póntos, or the Euxine Sea, is the name given by the Greeks to the Black Sea. In Ancient and Medieval times, Greeks established colonies along its northern coast, and still to this very day, many Pontic Greeks still inhabit the general area. With the use of an elaborate propaganda machine, as well as cunning diplomacy, we might be able to convince the international community of our legitimate claims in the area. However, Russia will most definitively not like this, and they shall do whatever it takes to keep their precious warm water ports.
Rome was traditionally part of the Eastern Roman Empire. As such, it is our duty to reclaim those lands back into our glorious realm, put their people to work and profit from their land!

The Treaty of Union, League and Perpetual Federation between the Republic of Gran Colombia and the Peru-Bolivia Confederation

In 1826, Símon Bolívar The Liberator, envisioned a unified state comprising the nascent republics of Gran Colombia, Peru and Bolivia. For this, he made his Plenipotenriary Minister, Joaquín Mosquera, sign the Treaty of Union, League and Perpetual Federation between the Republic of Colombia and the State of Peru with Peruvian Minister Bernardo Monteagudo, this treaty was an alliance of mutual help in case of invasion, with equal rights for citizens, ships and productions, establishment of military and naval contingents, protection of the national sovereignty of each party and postponement of the establishment of precise borders, a Confederacy in all senses. This, however, came to an end due to the deteriorating relations between Colombia and the Upper and Lower Peru, which marked the end of this treaty. We are in a similar position as The Liberator was so long ago, and now that a member of his bloodline sits on the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ throne, this treaty could finally be made a reality. Let us unite Colombia, Alto and Bajo Perú, as one single entity, for we shall become Bolivar's dreamed Andean Federation.

A Bolivian desire of unification with the Gran Colombia has remained strong ever since Peru's treacherous war of 1828. Perhaps this sentiment could be used in our favor, as Bolivia is now under our sphere of influence, they would gladly welcome the idea of being placed under our suzerainty once more, and perhaps this political move could move us closer to a union, but pull us further away from Peru, as they'd deem us a threat to their territorial integrity.
Peru must be conquered if our great nation is to become even greater. The first step is fomenting a change of government, one that would be friendlier to ours.
Now that both Peru and Bolivia are under our control, we will reform the Peru-Bolivia Confederation, a strong and united ally under our control.

Bolívar the Liberator once proposed that after the consolidation of the liberation of the Americas from Spanish yoke, the Caribbean should be freed from all Spanish influence. Unfortunately, his proposal could never be put into play, but now that $COUNTRY$ is in a favorable position, this glorious idea of our Liberator can be set in motion. If the Americas are to be truly free, then we must rid it from any and all tyrants, only this way can Bolívar's dream of true freedom be acheived… America for the Americans!
With an unexpected diplomatic move, the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$s have claimed the $COUNTRY$ Caribbean, with the jingoistic pretext of America being only for the Americans.
A Main Culture for our Realm.
We must choose a culture representing our union!
A Main Culture for our Realm.
We must choose a culture representing our union!
We must choose a proper capital for our nation!
We must choose a proper capital for our nation!

After Peru's treacherous war of independence against Gran Colombia in 1828, a desire of unification with the neighboring Bolivia has remained ever so strong since their liberation from Spanish yoke in 1821. Because we have become the overlord of Peru and Bolivia, this desire for unification has grown even stronger, with multitudes of people all across the country begging for Bolívar’s dream to be reborn anew. Perhaps this sentiment could be used in our favor, as both territories at one time became part of Bolívar’s short-lived empire, since we are the continuation of his grand scheme for liberation against foreign powers, our claims are backed by legitimacy in the eyes of the world. My friend, what a wonderful time to be alive and witness true freedom!

Once nominally part of the Gran Colombia, today Costa Rica faces many challenges as a small country located in an awkward part of our world that is plagued by civil wars and widespread instability. Perhaps it is our duty to coerce them into actually joining the Gran Colombian Federation this time, the addition of their territories could be useful in the long run!

Once nominally part of the Gran Colombia, today Costa Rica faces many challenges as a small country located in an awkward part of our world that is plagued by civil wars and widespread instability. As their overlord, it is our duty to incorporate Costa Rica into the Gran Colombian Federation, the addition of their territories could be useful in the long run!

In 1821, the Dominicans ordered a constitutive act to petition the union of Spanish Haiti with the Gran Colombia, as doing so would bring them prosperity and many other benefits from this prosperous nation. This decision, however, was not supported by the populace of African Slaves, many of whom were against the rule of pure white Criollos and instead, decided to defect to the French side because of their abolition of slavery. Preposterous! It is high time to bring them back into our fold, as these old constituent papers are still lying around… somewhere. Someone go find them already!

In 1821, the Dominicans ordered a constitutive act to petition the union of Spanish Haiti with the Gran Colombia, as doing so would bring them prosperity and many other benefits from this prosperous nation. This decision, however, was not supported by the populace of African Slaves, most of whom were against the rule of pure white Criollos and instead, decided to defect to the French side because of their abolition of slavery… And in the current year of our Lord, I hereby declare our faithful allies and subjects from la Española to be a rightful province of the Gran Colombian Federation!

The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Ministry of Interior proposed the possibility of founding new towns in which agriculture and mining could be greatly developed by immigrants from the European continent, particularly from Germany. Agustin Codazzi, as a government representative and by suggestion of the polymath Alexander von Humboldt, established contacts with the inhabitants of Kaiserstuhl in the Great Duchy of Baden, these people are eager to settle in the lands of the Cordillera de la Costa, near Caracas, shall we open our borders to selective immigration? Martin Tovar Ponte, the Count of Tovar, is waiting for an answer. He shall be our financer and will facilitate a plot of land for settling these Germans in Palmar del Tuy.
A safe haven for German immigrants.

After the great success that was the Colonia Tovar, the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Ministry of Interior has come up with another proposition: The development of infrastructure in order to attract more European immigrants. New towns and cities will be developed, most of which are going to be settled by Europeans. This shall greatly benefit our nation in the long run!
A safe haven for European immigrants.
And end to the Negro Question

'For hundreds of years the Negroes have yearned for freedom, but what can they dream of when they are not on their native soil?' Argues a $COUNTRY_ADJ$ statesman. While that might be true, the Negroes have always been part of $COUNTRY$ and some might argue they even helped build this country to be one of the greatest in the world. Even still, their distinct culture and customs, as well as ther unwillingness to integrate to $COUNTRY_ADJ$ culture makes most people look at them with suspicion. With that being said, several politicians have suggested that The $COUNTRY$ should make its own colony styled after the American Liberia: A place where Negroes could be sent to live and thrive in whatever way they want. As Africa would be too far away, and the shipping costs there would seriously injure our economy, they proposed sending them to Haiti, a placed ruled by ther kin… But first, we need permission from the Haitian Government to do so.

A request from $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ has recently left our politicians baffled: The $FROMCOUNTRY$ wishes to move all their Negroes to $COUNTRY$! While this might be considered an insult to some, our statesmen believe we could benefit from this proposition: A huge population boost would help us kickstart our economy… The only catch is that we must become their protectorate. What shall be done about this, my $MONARCHTITLE$?
Brilliant! Ask them to bring their Negroes at once.
This is foolishness, our half of the island cannot support such population!
And end to the Negro Question
$FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ agrees to our request! Preparations to round up and move the Negroes should begin soon.
And end to the Negro Question
$FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ thinks our request is foolish, as they believe their half of the island cannot support such sudden population boost.
Our plan to move the Negroes continues as planned. Another state has been cleared.
Negroes are being displaced from their homes.
With the Negro population moved to Haiti, new living opportunities open up on their decomised.

Saint Justinian I, one of the greatest Eastern Roman Emperors to ever live, managed to conquer some of the former territories of the Western Roman Empire around the Mediterranean Basin in the sixth century AD. As the successor state of the Hellenized Eastern Roman Empire, we can lay claims on the lands of our forerunners by an intricate system of propaganda and shameless irredentism. This won't be very well seen by the international community, but who are they to stop us?
A strange phenomenon is occuring throughout the realm, people have started adopting Greek culture and customs!
Aegyptos was traditionally part of the Ancient Hellenic world. As such, it is our duty to reclaim those lands back into our glorious realm, put their people to work and profit from their land!

The Levant was traditionally part of the Eastern Roman Empire and also under the influence of the Classical Hellenic world. As such, it is our duty to reclaim those lands back into our glorious realm, put their people to work and profit from their land!
The Holy Land was traditionally part of the Eastern Roman Empire. As such, it is our duty to reclaim those lands back into our glorious realm, put their people to work and profit from their land!

Cyrenaica and Tripolitania were traditionally Greek colonies in ancient times, along with Tunis, part of the later Eastern Roman Empire under Justinian I, was under Greek influence as well. As such, it is our duty to reclaim those lands back into our glorious realm, put their people to work and profit from their land!
Mauretania was traditionally part of the Eastern Roman Empire. As such, it is our duty to reclaim those lands back into our glorious realm, put their people to work and profit from their land!
Claim Corsica, Sardinia and the Baleares
These lands were traditionally part of the ancient Hellenic world. As such, it is our duty to reclaim those lands back into our glorious realm, put their people to work and profit from their land!

Spania, the southern part of modern Spain, used to be part of both the Eastern Roman Empire under Emperor Justinian I and home of many Greek colonies in classical times. As such, it is our duty to reclaim those lands back into our glorious realm, put their people to work and profit from their land!
These lands were traditionally part of the Eastern Roman Empire. As such, it is our duty to reclaim those lands back into our glorious realm, put their people to work and profit from their land!
Long ago, these lands were part of the Hellenic world. As such, it is our duty to reclaim those lands back into our glorious realm, put their people to work and profit from their land!
This province holds a Holy See of the Orthodox Church
Our country has restored all the Holy Sees of the Orthodox Church

While the office of the Ecumenical Patriarchate of Constantinople has always been occupied, the dreaded Turks have greatly culled its influence within the Orthodox Church and her faithful. Gone will be the days of Ottoman yoke, for hereby is decreed that the Pentarchy of Constantinople and the Ecumenical Patriarchate shall serve the $COUNTRY_ADJ$state, restoring their power and prestige to its former glory!

Originally, this Episcopal See was tied to the administrative structure of the Roman Empire, governed by a Patriarch who in turn, was loyal to the Roman Emperor. Posessing great political and ecclesiastical prominence, the Pentarchies were located in cities that are of much importance to this very day, which were also centers for the spread of early Christendom. Hereby is decreed that the Pentarchy of Antioch shall serve the $COUNTRY_ADJ$state, its power and prestige has been restored to their former glory.

Originally, this Episcopal See was tied to the administrative structure of the Roman Empire, governed by a Patriarch who in turn, was loyal to the Roman Emperor. Posessing great political and ecclesiastical prominence, the Pentarchies were located in cities that are of much importance to this very day, which were also centers for the spread of early Christendom. Hereby is decreed that the Pentarchy of Jerusalem shall serve the $COUNTRY_ADJ$state, its power and prestige has been restored to their former glory.

Originally, this Episcopal See was tied to the administrative structure of the Roman Empire, governed by a Patriarch who in turn, was loyal to the Roman Emperor. Posessing great political and ecclesiastical prominence, the Pentarchies were located in cities that are of much importance to this very day, which were also centers for the spread of early Christendom. Hereby is decreed that the Pentarchy of Alexandria shall serve the $COUNTRY_ADJ$state, its power and prestige has been restored to their former glory.

Originally, this Episcopal See was tied to the administrative structure of the Roman Empire, governed by a Patriarch who in turn, was loyal to the Roman Emperor. Posessing great political and ecclesiastical prominence, the Pentarchies were located in cities that are of much importance to this very day, which were also centers for the spread of early Christendom. Hereby is decreed that the Pentarchy of Rome shall serve the $COUNTRY_ADJ$state, its power and prestige has been restored to their former glory.

Originally, these Episcopal Sees were tied to the administrative structure of the Roman Empire, governed by five Patriarchs who in turn, were loyal to the Roman Emperor. Posessing great political and ecclesiastical prominence, the Pentarchies were located in cities that are of much importance to this very day, which were also centers for the spread of early Christendom. With the Pentarchies restored, we are expected to see an increase in our overall administration, as Church matters shall also be tied to the state.

While our Maritime Republic has always been small, our little plot of land under the heavens will not be able to support our sons and their children. It is time to expand beyond our borders, preferably uniting all the Italo-Dalmatian peoples under one flag, the Ragusan flag!.

While our Maritime Republic has always been small, our little plot of land under the heavens will not be able to support our sons and their children. It is time to expand beyond our borders, preferably uniting all the Italo-Dalmatian peoples under one flag, the Ragusan flag!.
We are the Zulia, and our region has been known to be Venezuela's Occident. This notion gives us a legitimate claim over the provinces comprising this region.

Part of the Guajira Peninsula has been part of our State since colonial times, only recent changes in the Colombo-Venezuelan borders have cut off some of our territories. While no longer part of our country, we still hold legitimate claims over most of the peninsula.
We own Caracas, the original capital of Venezuela. Should it become the capital once again?
Build a Military Academy for the encouragement of Prussian Military Traditions

Constant wars, order and a martially-oriented culture are what define the Prussians better. If we so wish for our armies to become a power to be reckoned with, we must ask for the aid of those who have mastered the art of war: The Germans.
Unpaid debts to the idependence war Veterans

During the war of independence, soldiers were promised plots of land for their service and were granted bonds as an assurance of their payment. These debts have not been paid, however, and our veterans are growing restless. What shall we do?
Pay them with plots of land as we promised.
Exchange their bonds for cash, our land is too valuable.
Liberal sentiment growing stronger in Venezuela

After witnessing the Liberal Spring in Europe, the Venezuelan people have begun to grow tired of the same old corrupt caudillos. Several veterans from the Independence war have begun preaching the ideals of Liberalism, tempting the masses with their honeyed words about personal freedom, universal voting and federalism.

The liberal Federalists are stirring trouble in the provinces, and sadly they are backed by the people. As angry mobs begin to chant in town squares, preaching personal freedom and more autonomy for their provinces, an ultimatum, written by a veteran from the independence war named Ezequiel Zamora, has reached our office… Surrender to the people's demands, ye goths, or we shall go to war.
If the people demand freedom, then so be it!
We must prepare for war… Rally the troops!
We will support them! (Play as the Federalists)

Rebels under the command of veteran soldiers from the independence war have gathered enough forces to declare themselves as the legitimate government of Venezuela. Their demands, while they might seem fair, could destabilize our country's economy, as amongst them is a change to our government's structure. And to add insult to injury, the governor of the Zulia state has declared sovereignty over the region, efficiently seceding from our control! Our country is crumbling, what would our liberator say about this? I shudder at the thought…
If they also want war, then so be it, but first we must take care of the Federalist rebels.
We will support the Zulia! (Play as the Zulia)
The Sovereign State of the Zulia
Sympathizers of the Federalist movement have arisen in the Zulia, seceding from our country. It's high time to put an end to this.
The Rightful Capital of the Gran Colombia
After the reunification of the Gran Colombia, the chamber of government has been wondering where should our capital be located.
Caracas, the birthplace of el Libertador!
I believe our capital should remain as it is.

With the reunification of the Gran Colombia, our chamber of government cannot decide on which model of centralism should our republic adopt: 33% are in for a federalist model, another 33% are in for a unitary model and finally, another 33% has decided it is the president’s duty to decide which model shall be adopted.
We shall use our old, pre-unification model.
Independent military strongmen are being encouraged into our administration
Our nation is reaping the benefits of an almost corruption-free administration
Our country is encouraging Prussian Military Traditions

After Simón Bolívar decreed the freedom of cults in Gran Colombia, Jews from Curaçao started to immigrate to Coro, seeking to establish business ties with the Kingdom of the Netherlands and the newly-established republic. 
In 1831, special taxes were imposed on these Jews due to the locals complaining about their rapid economic advance. Up to this very day, we still don’t know how they have managed to amass such fortunes, as their tax incomes are clean.
These special taxes have sprung up a little problem we ought to take care of. The Coro garrison, unable to pay their men for whatever reason, has started charging the Jews advance taxes, causing much distress in their community as they deem this an injustice. The soldiers, however, are very happy to be paid on time. Why were these men not getting paid in time anyway?
Little does it matter, we need to do something about these ‘taxes on advance’ lest we have a Jewish revolt on our hands.
Let the garrison charge advance taxes on the Jews.
Order the Curaçaoan foreigners not to pay any advance taxes.
Jews and other foreigners are being charged taxes in advance.

After we forbade Jews and foreigners from paying any advance taxes, the local garrison of Coro was forced to discharge some of their soldiers. These soldiers, disgruntled by their current situation, have started blaming the Jews for their misfortunes. One thing led to another and in under a few hours, a revolt had occurred. Jewish property was damaged and looted, thankfully nobody was killed in the event, but the locals now consider Jews to be Personae non-grata. \nAnd so, the Jews have started fleeing back to Curacao, the Netherlands has demanded compensation for their injured citizens, as well as laying claims in our territorial waters, namely the Isla de Aves which is the northernmost part of the Los Roques Archipelago administrative province. Tensions arise as diplomats from the Netherlands raise their tone. \nOn an immense diplomatic effort, a British consul has dissuaded the Netherlands from declaring war on our country… but not for long, as they await for an answer…
To hell with these godless heathens, Venezuela shall not vow to them or their puppets!
We shall apprehend the culprits and compensate these fine folks for their losses!

‘If the Jews feel persecuted in Venezuela, they should file a demand in a Venezuelan court!’ Shouts one of our diplomats, the room immediately falls into silence… \nMoments later, the Dutch diplomat storms out of the room, but not after shouting incoherencies in his strange language. \nThe British diplomat sighs in contempt, informing us that the Kingdom of the Netherlands shall be declaring war soon.

‘Indeed, we shall file a demand in the Supreme Tribunal of Justice seeking the apprehension of the aggressors and the monetary reparation for the citizens of Curacao and guarantee their safe return’ said one of our most cool-headed diplomats. The rest of the reunion goes smoothly, an international crisis has been averted!\nHowever, several days later, pamphlets start circulating in downtown Coro, saying ‘The people of Coro do not want the Jews. Stay out, go away like the dogs you are, and if you do not leave soon, the vultures will feast on your carcasses.’
Sadly, there is nothing we can do about this at the moment.

The Roman Question was a dispute regarding the temporal power of the popes as rulers of a civil territory in the context of the Italian unification. In July 1859, after France and Austria made an agreement that ended the short Second Italian War of Independence, an article headed "The Roman Question" in the Westminster Review expressed the opinion that the Papal States should be deprived of the Adriatic provinces and be restricted to the territory around Rome. This became a reality in the following year, when most of the Papal States were annexed by what became the Kingdom of Italy.\n The Lateran Treaty resolved the Roman Question in 1929, the Holy See acknowledged Italian sovereignty over the former Papal States and Italy recognized papal sovereignty over Vatican. The Holy See limited its request for indemnity for the loss of the Papal States and of ecclesiastical property confiscated by the Italian State to much less than would have been due to it under the Law of Guarantees.
After solving the dispute of the Roman Question, the Vatican has become an 'independent' city state within our de-jure territories.
Become the United States of Venezuela
After winning the Federal war against the Conservatives, we are in a position to replace the losing side and reform our constitution in order make Venezuela a union of federal states.
After winning the Federal war against the Federalists, we are in a position to deliver justice to those who were responsible for this war. The Federalist union shall be no more!
End of the Sovereign State of the Zulia

After winning the Federal war against the Federalists, we are in a position to deliver justice to the traitorous Zulians who seceded from our nation. The Sovereign State of the Zulia shall be no more!
Huge iron deposits have been discovered near cerro el Pao in Angostura, the deposits are so rich and of such high quality, international buyers are lining up to acquire our iron!
Rich deposits of high quality iron are being mined here.

As we continue the fight, one of our most important generals is captured and transported to Bahia for incarceration. Due to the growing unrest in some of their provinces, Brazil is willing to negotiate a ceasefire… In exchange of our general.
Exchange a General for a ceasefire? Seriously?
No man shall be left behind!
The Juliana Republic secedes from Brazil!
General David Canabarro, with the help of the Italian Giuseppe Garibaldi, have declared an independent republic in the province of Santa Catarina!
We will support them! (Play as Juliana)
The Juliana Republic secedes from Brazil!
General David Canabarro, with the help of the Italian Giuseppe Garibaldi, have declared an independent republic in the province of Santa Catarina!
We will support them! (Play as Juliana)
The Federation of Rio Grande do Sul and Juliana
Sharing a common goal, these two sister natios hereby form a federation to stand against any aggressions which might threaten our independence. United against Brazil shall we stand.
The Federation of Rio Grande do Sul and Juliana
Sharing a common goal, these two sister natios hereby form a federation to stand against any aggressions which might threaten our independence. United against Brazil shall we stand.
Now that we are a strong, independent state, $COUNTRY$ must attempt to control Uruguay, another nation which form the Banda Oriental of the Uruguay.
After being internationally recognized as an independent state, we are able to fully integrate the nations which comprise the Banda Oriental of the Uruguay.
After being internationally recognized as an independent state, $FROMCOUNTRY$ was able to fully integrate the nations which comprise the Banda Oriental of the Uruguay.

Originally a no-man's land, the Banda Oriental became a contested area between the Portuguese and Spanish empires. Uruguay, our country, occupies half of these territories. It is high time we occupy the other half as well.

The political constitution of Peru of 1826, better known as the Constitución Vitalicia, was the second constitution of Peru, made by Simón Bolívar and was active for only 50 days, as it was not discussed by any congress, nor was it called for popular consultation. What is peculiar about this constitution is that it is an adaptation of the Napoleonic ‘Constitution de l'an VIII’ which gave Napoleon special constitutional powers akin to those of a dictator, a president for life or ‘Vitalicio’ in Spanish.\n We are in a similar position as Bolívar was in 1826, but we cannot afford to make the same mistakes, a dictatorship would greatly destabilize our country and an absolute monarchy ruled by despotic autocrats would be a clear offense against those who gave their lives for our freedom. What our Reactionary majority had in mind was a Monarchic system with guaranteed rights through a constitution, this way, the rights of the people would not be curtailed and the higher echelons of society would be very pleased to obtain royal titles with all the prestige those entail. Who shall be our new monarch you ask? We have a perfect candidate, a cousin of the very Simón Bolívar freed our nation, but first, he must obtain approval from our congress…

We are in a favorable position to engineer a coup in order to sunder the Transcaucasian Union, freeing the people from Russian yoke. While what might come next could be described as an uncertain future, it is for the best that Russia's ambitions on the Caucasus come to an end.
The kingdoms of Armenia and Cilicia must unite under a single flag, and together achieve our destiny as a Greater Armenia!
If Greater Armenia is to exist once again, we must lay claim to all its territory - and reunite it by sword, if need be!
Greater Armenia shall be reborn from the ashes. Long live the united Armenia!
If Dagestan is to be united, we must lay claim to all its territory - and reunite it by sword, if need be!
The principalities of Dagestan must unite under a single flag once more, and together achieve our destiny to topple foreign influences!

The Cisplatine Provinces of Uruguay, Rio Grande do Sul and Santa Catarina are located in what is known as the Banda Oriental del Uruguay, formerly a contested area between the Spanish and Portuguese Empires which had been troubled with smuggling and wars until not long ago. $COUNTRY$, after having claimed the provinces which comprise this region, is in a favorable position to formally unite them as an internationally-recognized nation. Today shall be the inception of a new republic, the Republic of the Banda Oriental!
If a unified Celtic nation is to exist, we must lay claim to all its territory - and reunite it by sword, if need be!
The Celtic Nations must unite under a single flag and together achieve our destiny to topple foreign influences!
Originally a Celtic Nation, Galicians underwent a gradual process of Latinization. It is time to reunite with our long-lost brothers!
The island of Newfoundland is home to many Irishmen. Based on their population, we could lay claims on the islands and obtain territories across the seas.

Nova Scotia and the Prince Edward Island are home to many Scots. Based on their population, we could lay claims over there and obtain territories across the seas.
