With Alaska secured under $COUNTRY_ADJ$ dominion, a heated debate has ensued in $CAPITAL$ concerning the legal status of the original Russian settlers from the former colony of Alaska, their destiny shall be decided in the upcoming hours…

With Alaska secured under $COUNTRY_ADJ$ dominion, a heated debate has ensued in $CAPITAL$ concerning the legal status of the original Russian settlers from the former colony of Alyaska. Several dignitaries, both $COUNTRY_ADJ$ and Alaskan in origin, have proposed the recognition of Alaskans, as well as their language and customs, as part of $COUNTRY$, arguing that they will facilitate the settling as well as exploitation of the vast natural resources found in Alaska… Their origins are also very similar to ours: Settlers and adventurers, as well as former convicts, seeking greater freedom from what they deemed to be an oppressive, autocratic regime, who carved their new homes from the untamed wilderness. Both proponents and opponents have been arguing for hours and neither side seems to reach consensus… Ultimately, it is your duty as the $MONARCHTITLE$ of $COUNTRY$ to make the final decision concerning the Russian settlers, for the Territory of Alyaska will nevertheless become a State of our Federation.
Alaskans shall become a part of our nation!
All $COUNTRY_ADJ$s must share a common culture, there is no room for those who don't wish to integrate.

The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Nation has finally been consolidated and our old unitary model of governance makes it nigh-impossible to properly manage the vast expanses of land comprising our country. A heated debate has ensued in $CAPITAL$ and after several days of deliberations, our Statesmen have come to the conclusion that Cascadia must follow a federalist model in which every state shall possess a certain degree of autonomy… Our nation must also be restructured in order for this model to work and three states have been proposed: The State of Jefferson shall be the southernmost state, named in honor of US President Thomas Jefferson who facilitated the expedition of Lewis & Clark in the territories which became $COUNTRY$ and comprised of our holdings in Northern California and Southwestern Oregon. The State of Oregon, comprising the territories between the 42nd and 49th parallels, sans those belonging to Jefferson. And the state of Columbia, comprised of the territories between the 49th and the infamous 54°40' parallels. With this new model, $COUNTRY_ADJ$shall enjoy a greater degree of autonomy, which translates in more settlers and more towns and cities founded in our nation.

With the acquisition of Alaska many in $COUNTRY$ are calling for the immediate annexation of all territories south of the Yukon River. Those in favor of the idea claim that it is our destiny to establish a contiguous federation north of the 49th parallel. A heated debate has ensued and now $COUNTRY$ must decide what to do…

With the acquisition of Alaska many in $COUNTRY$ are calling for the immediate annexation of all territories south of the Yukon River. Those in favor of the idea claim that it is our destiny to establish a contiguous federation north of the 54°40' parallel. If we follow through with this demand we can rest assured that the British will not be happy.
Manifest Destiny is the way forward!

The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ have issued us an ultimatum. They are demanding we renounce and secede all our possessions along the Yukon River and down the continental divide to the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$'s newly acquired Alaskan territories. Refusing would most definitely mean a costly war in North America over more sparsely populated territory.
The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$s will not dictate our colonial holdings.
The previously rich mines of $PROVINCENAME$ have all dried up and the people there have begun to migrate elsewhere.

The Klondike Gold Rush began on $YEAR$, when gold was found by George Carmack and Skookum Jim at Bonanza Creek in the Yukon Territory. The first to hear confirmed information of the gold rush were the people in Seattle and San Francisco, and they were the first to start flocking to the territory in late $YEAR$. \n\n All in all, the news of gold brought some 100,000 people to the Yukon from the rest of Canada and abroad. Of the 100,000, most arrived by sea and traveled overland from Southeast Alaska through the Chilkoot and the White Pass trails to the Yukon River and sailed down to the Klondike.
There’s gold in them thar hills!

The Pike’s Peak Gold Rush began on $YEAR$, when gold was found by William Greeneberry "Green" Russell at the confluence of the Cherry Creek and the South Platte River in Colorado. The first to hear confirmed information of the gold rush were the people in St. Louis, California, and they were the first to start flocking to the territory in late $YEAR$. \n\n All in all, the news of silver brought some 100,000 people to the Rockies from the rest of the United States and abroad.
There’s gold in them thar hills!

The Colorado Silver Boom began on $YEAR$, when Silver was found near the site of Leadville in Colorado. The first to hear confirmed information of the gold rush were the people in St. Louis, California, and they were the first to start flocking to the territory in late $YEAR$. \n\n All in all, the news of silver brought thousands of people to the Rockies from the rest of the United States and abroad.
There’s silver in them thar hills!

The Second Colorado Silver Boom began on $YEAR$, when advances in mining technology allowed prospectors to easily separate lead from the silver ore. People started flocking to the Creede in late $YEAR$. \n\n All in all, the news of silver brought thousands of people to Creede from the rest of the United States and abroad.
There’s silver in them thar hills!

The Nevada Silver Rush began on $YEAR$, when silver was discovered in Mount Davidson. The first to hear confirmed information of the gold rush were people California, and soon enough they were the first to start flocking to the territory in late $YEAR$. \n\n All in all, the news of silver brought thousands of people to Nevada from the rest of the United States and abroad.
There’s silver in them thar mountains!

The Nome Gold Rush began on $YEAR$, when gold was found by Jafet Lindeberg, Erik Lindblom and John Brynteson at Anvil Creek in Western Alaska. The first to hear confirmed information of the gold rush were the people in the Yukon, but the news quickly spread to Seattle, San Francisco and even Australia. \n\n In late $YEAR$ people started flocking the beaches of Nome, in the Unalakleet district, where gold was simply found lying along the beaches. The easy access to the mining sites attracted many prospectors and soon Nome became bustling town with telegraph stations, theaters and even automobiles.
There’s gold in them thar shores!

The Fairbanks Gold Rush began on $YEAR$, when gold was found by Felice Pedroni at the Tanana Valley in the Interior Alaska. The first to hear confirmed information of the gold rush were the people in the Yukon and Nome but the news quickly spread to Seattle and San Francisco. \n\n In late $YEAR$ people from Nome and the Yukon started flocking the banks and tributaries of the Tanana River, setting up dredges and sluices to obtain the precious metal.
There’s gold in them thar rivers!

Krepost Ross is a $COUNTRY_ADJ$ holding in Northern California which was established in 1812 as an agricultural settlement and a supply line to our colonies in Alyaska. Due to its remoteness and the decreasing value of the trade and produce in the area, Krepost Ross’ agricultural importance has been considerably decreasing during the last few years, forcing our entrepreneurs to consider selling it to an appropriate buyer.

Krepost Ross is a $COUNTRY_ADJ$ holding in Northern California which was established in 1812 as an agricultural settlement and a supply line to our colonies in Alyaska. Due to its remoteness and the decreasing value of the trade and produce in the area, Krepost Ross’ agricultural importance has been considerably decreasing during the last few years, forcing our entrepreneurs to consider selling it to an appropriate buyer. What shall be done about it?
Perhaps we should look for a buyer.
Krepost Ross is not for sale!

We hear word from the Russian ambassador that they are willing to sell their Krepost Ross colony to us, for the right price. Perhaps we should consider making an offer before someone else snaps it up? The land isn't worth much at the moment, but owning Krepost Ross would be a boon to our prestige.
We have received an offer from $FROMCOUNTRY$ to purchase the Krepost Ross colony. Should we accept?
We have changed our mind. Krepost Ross is not for sale.
Russia has agreed to the sale. Krepost Ross is ours!
The talks with Russia have broken down. They refuse to sell Krepost Ross to us.

We have little use for our North American holdings. They are difficult to defend, and would be worth far more to another country than it is to us. Several Statesmen have suggested to sell Alyaska, while others fervently believe there are many richest to be unearthed there. Whatever is the case, a decision regarding the future of our colony must be taken.

We have little use for our North American holdings. They are difficult to defend, and would be worth far more to another country than it is to us. Several Statesmen have suggested to sell Alyaska, while others fervently believe there are many richest to be unearthed there. While it may take some time to find an interested and appropriate buyer, perhaps we should start the process?
Indeed, we must look for a Buyer.

As one of the southernmost $COUNTRY_ADJ$ holdings in North America, Fort Ross is of extreme importance due to its proximity to the San Francisco Bay, so much that several entrepreneurs have proposed building a proper city in the area, which will be styled after the city of Sevastopol in Crimea. The old settlement is in dire need for investment and plans have been laid already, all we need is some money for the final investment so Fort Ross can capitalize from the aftermath of the Californian Gold Rush.
Tahoe is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Tahoe is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Tahoe is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Tahoe is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Tahoe is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Tahoe is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.

Russia originally claimed a vast strip of land along the coast of the North American Pacific Coast, from British Columbia to Northern California, but said claims were forgotten ever since the  Adams-Onís Treaty of 1819. With the consolidation of $COUNTRY$’s position in the Americas, it would be wise to renovate these claims, much against the USA and Britain’s wishes… it is our destiny.

We hear word from the Motherland that they are willing to sell their Alaskan colony as they deem it unprofitable and hard to defend, and with the growing hostilities with the British, the sentiment has grown among the investors and the Tsar himself… \n\n Our Homeland, sold to foreigners, just imagine our fate going back to trading pelts in Siberia or Kamchatka to places where we are unwelcomed like China or Japan. This thought has sparked an outrage among some of the colonists who wish to maintain their status quo and their hard-earned properties and serfdom. What shall we do, my governor?
The Russian American Company, run by fools as always has refused to the changing of hands of their holdings, for the good of the common man we must remove them by force.
The End of the Russian Colonization of the Americas

As Russia seeks for a suitable buyer for her Alyaskan colonies, another chapter in the annals of history has been finished. Disheartened, Alyaskans begin to wonder what does the future have in store for them.
The End of the Russian-American Company

The Russian-American Company has defeated the Russian government and has asserted their rule of Alyaska an independent state. The company has restyled itself as a Bourgeois Dictatorship with the former Governor of Alyaska styling himself as the 'Honourable First Among Equals' and ruling with a triumvirate of company excecutives.EVT1100046OPTA
Northern California is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Northern California is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Oregon is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Oregon is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Washington is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Washington is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Columbia is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Columbia is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.

An intrepid Physician named Georg Anton Schäffer once tried conquering Hawaii in the name of the Russian-American Company, which ultimately failed causing an event known as the Hawaiian Spectacular. This bloodless diplomatic incident made Russia a little less than welcomed in the Kingdom of Hawaii, due to Dr. Schäffer’s attempt to overthrow King Kamehameha I by turning the natives against him. Though his venture was not at all unfruitful, for Georg Anton Schäffer commissioned the construction of several forts on the island of Kauai, which have been used by the natives ever since… these fortresses rightfully belong to the Russian-American Company, Schäffer’s old employer, and by intricate legal claims, as well as the exploitation of several loopholes in the company’s constabulary, $COUNTRY$ has enough validity to create a Casus Belli for the establishment of a protectorate over the Islands of Hawaii with the pretext of the indemnification for the company’s lost investment.

The Kingdom of Hawaii lies in a strategic position right in the middle of the Pacific Ocean. Several Great Powers have attempted to get a hold of the islands in the past and will most likely keep doing so until the Archipelago comes under their dominion… $COUNTRY$, as rising power, must also attempt to assert dominance over these islands. Controlling the Pacific Shipping Routes to Asia would be a great boon to our economy and it is always beneficial to have more land to settle… Though the natives might disagree with our policies, they can be dealt with once the islands have been secured under $COUNTRY_ADJ$ dominion.
Now that the Hawaiian Islands have been placed under $COUNTRY_ADJ$sovereignty, they must be properly integrated into our territories as a colony.

With Hawaii secured under $COUNTRY_ADJ$ dominion, a heated debate has ensued in $CAPITAL$ concerning the legal status of the natives of said islands, their destiny shall be decided in the upcoming hours…

With Hawaii secured under $COUNTRY_ADJ$ dominion, a heated debate has ensued in $CAPITAL$ concerning the legal status of the natives of said islands. Several dignitaries, both $COUNTRY_ADJ$ and Hawaiian in origin, have proposed the recognition of Hawaiians, as well as their language and customs, as part of $COUNTRY$, arguing that they will facilitate the settling as well as exploitation of the vast natural resources found in Hawaii… Their origins are also very similar to ours: Settlers and adventurers seeking greater freedom that parted to the unknown and carved their new homes from the untamed wilderness, they are also Christian in faith, which can be deemed as a plus depending who we ask. Both proponents and opponents have been arguing for hours and neither side seems to reach consensus… Ultimately, it is your duty as the $MONARCHTITLE$ of $COUNTRY$ to make the final decision concerning the Hawaiians, for the Islands of Hawaii will nevertheless become a State of our Federation.
Hawaiians shall become a part of our nation!
Unwashed savages in our $COUNTRY$? Are you out of your mind?
The Hawaiian Islands are rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
The Hawaiian Islands are rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
The Hawaiian Islands are rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
The Central Pacific Islands are rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
The Central Pacific Islands are rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
The Central Pacific Islands are rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
The Southern Line Islands are rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
The Southern Line Islands are rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
The Southern Line Islands are rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.

The destiny of Cascadia is to bring civilization to all the Rockies.  From the Aleutian Islands to the southernmost point of Baja California shall our great nation extend, open for European Settlers from far and wide… Let the Forests of Cascadia sprout on the most inhospitable corners of our continent, it is our destiny!

The Islands of Revillagigedo and the Clipperton Atoll have always been considered a de facto part of our sovereignty. However, no expeditions have ever been sent to the islands and they has never been formally annexed to our territories. It is high time to do so…

Isla del Coco lies off the coast of Costa Rica and has always been considered a de facto part of that territory. However, no expeditions have ever been sent to the island and it has never been formally annexed to our territories. It is high time to do so…
The New Territorial Organization of Cascadia
With the inclusion of the Californias and Deseret into our country, we must now integrate both of these territories as sovereign states of our federation.

An interesting development occurred after the integration of the Californias as a Federal State: The people there have begun referring to themselves as 'Californian', showing a staunch allegiance to their nation and traditions.

An interesting development occurred after the integration of the Californias as a Federal State: The people there have begun referring to themselves as 'Californian', showing a staunch allegiance to their nation and traditions.

An interesting development occurred after the integration of Deseret as a Federal State: The Mormons have begun referring to themselves as 'Deseretians', showing a staunch allegiance to their nation and distinct culture.

An interesting development occurred after the integration of Deseret as a Federal State: The Mormons have begun referring to themselves as 'Deseretians', showing a staunch allegiance to their nation and distinct culture.
California and Deseret have been successfully integrated as Federal Subjects of our nation!

We are interested in purchasing Baja California from Mexico. As such, we have sent delegates to Mexico City and are currently awaiting a reply. Having very good relations with Mexico, an alliance with them or being a Great Power will greatly improve our chances of getting a deal
$FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ delegates have recently come in from $FROMCOUNTRY$ in hopes of purchasing Baja California. What should we do?
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has agreed to sell Baja California to us!
$MONARCHTITLE$, negotiations with $FROMCOUNTRY$ over Baja California have stalled, and they have declined to sell us the territories
The territories encompassing the Rockies are under our control. Now is the time to sit down with the Americans and work out a peace deal that will see them transferred into $COUNTRY_ADJ$ hands

The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$s have proven far more resilient than we ever would have thought possible, and now we face the humiliating prospect of surrendering the territories encompassing the Rockies to them. It seems we have little choice, with the war going so badly and California already occupied. All we can do is decide whether we will pursue a conciliatory path with the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$s and perhaps make them future allies or aim at returning in the future and reclaiming what has been lost.

The Cascadians have proven far more resilient than the world would ever have thought possible, and now the Americans face the humiliating prospect of surrendering the Rockies to them. It seems they have little choice, with the war going so poorly and California already occupied. Preparations are underway for a meeting with the Cascadians at Los Angeles to determine the terms of American surrender.

The Cascadians have proven far more resilient than the world would ever have thought possible, and now preparations are underway for a meeting with the Cascadians at Los Angeles to determine the terms of American surrender
The Cascadians have proven far more resilient than expected, and now preparations are underway for a meeting with the Cascadians at Los Angeles to determine the terms of American surrender
Never! There will be a reckoning…

$FROMCOUNTRY$ has sent negotiators to work out the terms of their surrender. The tone is one of reconciliation, and it is clear the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ wishes to build good relations with us after the business of this war is done

$FROMCOUNTRY$ has sent negotiators to work out the terms of their surrender. The tone of the talks has been very bitter, and it's clear the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ government will do all it can to return and trouble us again in the future
We shall accept their surrender nevertheless
With California secured under $COUNTRY_ADJ$ dominion, a heated debate has ensued in $CAPITAL$ concerning the legal status of Californians, their destiny shall be decided in the upcoming hours…

With California secured under $COUNTRY_ADJ$ dominion, a heated debate has ensued in $CAPITAL$ concerning the legal status of Californians. Several dignitaries, both $COUNTRY_ADJ$ and Californian in origin, have proposed the recognition of Californians, as well as their customs, as part of $COUNTRY$, arguing that they will facilitate the settling as well as exploitation of the vast natural resources found in California… Their origins are also very similar to ours: Settlers and adventurers seeking greater freedom that parted to the unknown and carved their new homes from the untamed wilderness. Both proponents and opponents have been arguing for hours and neither side seems to reach consensus… Ultimately, it is your duty as the $MONARCHTITLE$ of $COUNTRY$ to make the final decision concerning the Californians, for The Californias will nevertheless become a State of our Federation.
Californians shall become a part of our nation!
All $COUNTRY_ADJ$s must share a common culture, there is no room for those who don't wish to integrate.
With Deseret secured under $COUNTRY_ADJ$ dominion, a heated debate has ensued in $CAPITAL$ concerning the legal status of the Mormons. Their destiny shall be decided in the upcoming hours…

With Deseret secured under $COUNTRY_ADJ$ dominion, a heated debate has ensued in $CAPITAL$ concerning the legal status of the Mormons. Several dignitaries, both $COUNTRY_ADJ$ and Mormon in origin, have proposed the recognition of Mormons, as well as their customs and religion, as part of $COUNTRY$, arguing that they will facilitate the settling as well as exploitation of the vast natural resources found in Deseret Their origins are also very similar to ours: Settlers and adventurers seeking greater freedom that parted to the unknown and carved their new homes from the untamed wilderness. Both proponents and opponents have been arguing for hours and neither side seems to reach consensus… Ultimately, it is your duty as the $MONARCHTITLE$ of $COUNTRY$ to make the final decision concerning the Mormons, for Deseret will nevertheless become a State of our Federation.
Mormons shall become a part of our nation!
Heathens in our $COUNTRY$? Are you out of your mind?
The legal status of polygamy in $COUNTRY$

Lately, many Mormons have approached our governmental institutions inquiring about the legal status of polygamy in $COUNTRY$. The leaders of many Mormon communities across the country are very concerned about this topic and are urging our $MONARCHTITLE$ take action on the matter.

Lately, many Mormons have approached our governmental institutions inquiring about the legal status of polygamy in $COUNTRY$. The leaders of many Mormon communities across the country are very concerned about this topic and are urging our $MONARCHTITLE$ take action on the matter. What shall be done about it?
Grant Mormons the right to excercise polygamy
This degeneracy cannot be allowed in $COUNTRY$!

The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ territories in North America and the Pacific are extensive, but lack settlers. It is time to encourage immigration so the vast $COUNTRY_ADJ$ wilderness can be tamed, onwards to North America!… … …And the Central Pacific.

Native Hawaiians are rowdy and uneducated, they refuse to integrate and are generally a torn in our side… Several hardline Conservative politicians have proposed resettling them… To the Kamchatka Peninsula. While it might seem cruel, we must understand that the Islands of Hawaii are a $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Military Frontier and hold a strategic position in the Pacific. They must be free from all inconvenciences, including rowdy natives.
Our nation is going through a process of naturalization for the newly-arrived immigrants.
Mormons in Mormon Jesus, and also in polygamy, the taking of many wives, and encourage their followers to have VERY large families.
$COUNTRY$ has opened its frontiers for settlers and homesteaders who wish to live the Cascadian Dream.

'Civilization must be brought to the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ wilderness!' Said a congressman during the latest session concerning immigration. He states that for $COUNTRY$ to grow further, the vast expanses of land covering our nation must be tamed and settled like the previous generations did not too long ago… That is the true spirit of $COUNTRY$, Freedom. By encouraging European immigration into our country, our future as a nation can be secured for the future generations… But make no mistake, for our country shall be Cascadian, our immigrants must take an oath to accept and embrace the Cascadian National Identity… This shall be known as the Cascadian Dream!
The people of California have begun referring to themselves as 'Californian', showing a staunch allegiance to their nation.
The people of California have begun referring to themselves as 'Californian', showing a staunch allegiance to their nation. It is time they are formally recognized as $COUNTRY_ADJ$ by the government.
The people of Deseret have begun referring to themselves as 'Deseretian', showing a staunch allegiance to their nation. It is time they are formally recognized as $COUNTRY_ADJ$ by the government.
The people of Deseret have begun referring to themselves as 'Deseretian', showing a staunch allegiance to their nation.

Immigrants living in our American colonies have begun referring to themselves as 'Alyaskan', showing a staunch allegiance to their Colony. It is time they are formally recognized as Alyaskan by the government.
Immigrants living in our American colonies have begun referring to themselves as 'Alyaskan', showing a staunch allegiance to their Colony.
Repel the Nootka Conventions and the Adams–Onís Treaty

The Nootka Conventions were a series of treaties signed in the late 18th century between the Kingdom of Spain and the Kingdom of Great Britain, signed in the 1790s, which averted a war between the two empires over overlapping claims to portions of the Pacific Northwest coast of North America. The third and last one, The Convention for the Mutual Abandonment of Nootka, called for the mutual abandonment of Nootka Sound. Britain and Spain were both free to use Nootka Sound as a port and erect temporary structures… And the Adams–Onís Treaty was a treaty between the United States and Spain in 1819 that ceded Florida to the U.S. and defined the boundary between the U.S. and New Spain. It settled a standing border dispute between the two countries and was considered a triumph of American diplomacy. It came in the midst of increasing tensions related to Spain's territorial boundaries in North America against the United States and Great Britain in the aftermath of the American Revolution
column3: it also came during the Latin American wars of independence. Seeing as the British clearly broke their end of the deal, and the Americans have attempted to rip our territories away, $COUNTRY$ is in position to repel these dreadful treaties and restore their claims over the region… It is our destiny.

column2: Oregon is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Oregon is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Washington is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Washington is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Columbia is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Columbia is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Idaho is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Idaho is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Montana is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Montana is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Wyoming is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.
Wyoming is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.

Envoys from the so-called 'Texan Resistance' have recently contacted our top politicians, pleading for aid to liberate their nation from American yoke. They deeply regret having requested statehood and now they wish to strike a deal with us: A treaty of friendship and mutual cooperation if we help them regain their freedom. Shall we sign it?

Envoys from the so-called 'Texan Resistance' have recently contacted several $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ politicians, pleading for aid to liberate their nation from 'American yoke'. They deeply regret having requested statehood and now they wish to strike a deal with us: A treaty of friendship and mutual cooperation if we help them regain their freedom.
It appears that the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$s have somehow gotten a hold of our secret deal with the Texans… $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ Politicians are now vilifying our nation, accussing us of imperialism!
It makes one wonder who could be behind all this…

Both Yankees and Dixies living in our country have begun referring to themselves as 'Texan', showing a staunch allegiance to their nation. It is time they are formally recognized as $COUNTRY_ADJ$ by the government.
Both Yankees and Dixies living in our country have begun referring to themselves as 'Texan', showing a staunch allegiance to their nation.
The Isla del Coco Penal Colony

The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ political prisoners and other dissidents are in dire need for a comfortable place to stay, and the Isla del Coco might be the answer. With enough funding, we might be able to turn the island into our own penal colony.
A dried up old traveller has returned from the wilderness. When given a whiskey he says with a hoarse voice 'Silver! I have found Silver! A mountain of Silver!'
A dried up old traveller has returned from the wilderness. When given a whiskey he says disappointingly 'Iron… I have found Iron… Dangit, I wanted Gold!'
A climate of strikes and hostility plagues this province.
A New Governor for Las Californias

The Governor of Las Californias, José Figueroa, died in September of last year and interim Governor Nicolás Gutiérrez suggests it is high time to appoint a new governor to the province… There are many candidates but the most notable are Mariano Chico, born in Central Mexico, who was Governor of Aguas Calientes and is very loyal to the Government of Mexico city, and Mariano Guadalupe Vallejo, a Californian born in Monterey, Commander of the Fourth Military District and Director of Colonization of the Northern Frontier. While a Californian might be the most sensible answer, in these trying times Las Californias need a Governor who would be loyal to the Central Government… Guadalupe Vallejo might push for local autonomy, something which cannot permitted. Who shall be appointed as the new Governor?
Appoint Mexican-born Mariano Chico, loyal to the government.

Trouble brews in Las Californias after the acting Governor, Mariano Chico, was travelling to Mexico City to gather troops against a supposed Californian revolt, a group of Californians led by Juan Bautista Alvarado with the help of the American Captain Isaac Graham and his company of Riflemen from Tennessee, have rose up in arms, wrote a constitution and adopted a new flag!
Traitors, there shall be grave consequences!
There is nothing we can do…
We will support them! (Play as Las Californias)

Trouble brews in Las Californias after the acting Governor, Mariano Chico, was travelling to Mexico City to gather troops against a supposed Californian revolt, a group of Californians led by Juan Bautista Alvarado with the help of the American Captain Isaac Graham and his company of Riflemen from Tennessee, have rose up in arms, wrote a constitution and adopted a new flag! While Mariano Chico was clearly running away from his responsibilities in California, we cannot ignore the revolt taking place there. The demands of Juan Bautista Alvarado are simple: He wishes to be recognized as the Governor of Las Californias, or else he will secede from Mexico… While this is a clear transgression against our Gorvernment, quelling the moods in Las Californias might be the most sensible option, the province is very far away and a war against them would be disastrous! What shall be done about this?
Recognize Juan Bautista Alvarado, leader of the revolt, as the Governor.
Mariano Chico is still the Governor, we will put these insurgents down!
The Council of Los Angeles Protests!

‘Alvarado is a corrupt womanizer and a drunkard with a severe lack of morals!’ Chant the people of Los Angeles, who have risen up in protest against Juan Bautista Alvarado, the newly-appointed governor of Las Californias. It appears he is not very popular over there in Los Angeles, but fairly well-liked elsewhere… The Council of Los Angeles is now threatening with revolts if Alvarado is not deposed… Sir we might have another revolt on our hands! The people of Los Angeles want Carlos Antonio Carrillo, who opposed Alvarado’s revolt, but I don’t think he is as popular over the rest of California as Alvarado is… And if we remove Alvarado, he might even plot another revolt! What shall we do about this?
Appoint Californio Carlos Antonio Carrillo, popular among the people of Los Angeles.
Alvarado stays, We cannot risk another revolt.

Trouble brews in Las Californias after a disgruntled Juan Bautista Alvarado revolts once again, he demands the position of Governor of Las Californias and the removal of Carlos Antonio Carrillo, whom he has labeled a traitor, from office! The mood all over Las Californias is rather tense, and only the people in Southern California seem to actually like Carrillo… What shall be done about this, Sir?
Relent and recognize Alvarado as the Governor.
Carrillo stays, to war it is!

$COUNTRY$ has finally managed to quell the Californio Revolt of $YEAR$, appointing Pío de Jesús Pico as the acting Governor and finally executing the insurgent Juan Bautista Alvarado on the basis of treason. A firing squad shall soon take care of him this afternoon… At last peace reigns over Las Californias.
Let us hope for the best…

In a surprise development, the leader of Mexico - General Antonio de Santa Anna himself - has been captured. Found running through the countryside, attempting to escape back to Mexico, he has been imprisoned in a $COUNTRY_ADJ$ jail and forced to negotiate. We can force the man to agree to a peace treaty - even though many consider the odds of Santa Anna's own country agreeing to terms exacted under duress to be slight, it may be our only hope against overwhelming odds. At the very least, the humiliation dealt against their leader will be a blow against the Mexican government and one from which they will not soon recover.
Force him to sign the treaty.

In a humiliating blow to Mexico's prestige, General Santa Anna has been captured again! But this time, it happened within $COUNTRY_ADJ$ territory - separated from our army and found wandering the countryside in an attempt to return to Mexico. While imprisoned, he agreed to a series of treaties which recognized $COUNTRY_ADJ$ independence among other guarantees… all in exchange for his safe return. We are now faced with a question: While the treaties are worthless, disregarding them completely could give the Americans a cause to intervene. Either way, one thing is certain: as the architect of this fiasco, Santa Anna's time in power is done.

In a humiliating blow to Mexico's prestige, General Santa Anna has been captured again! But this time, it happened within Californian territory - found wandering the countryside in an attempt to return to Mexico. While imprisoned, Santa Anna agreed to a series of treaties which recognized Californian independence among other guarantees… All in exchange for his safe return. The question now falls to Mexico whether to honor the Treaties of San Diego, obtained under duress, or to refute them.

In a humiliating blow to Mexico's prestige, General Santa Anna has been captured again! But this time, it happened within Californian territory - found wandering the countryside in an attempt to return to Mexico. While imprisoned, Santa Anna agreed to a series of treaties in exchange for his safe return.

In a humiliating blow to Mexico's prestige, General Santa Anna has been captured again! But this time, it happened within Californian territory. While imprisoned, Santa Anna agreed to a series of treaties in exchange for his safe return.
Honor the treaty and negotiate for Santa Anna's return.
Continue the war. Let the Californios do as they wish.

While Mexico had every reason to refute the treaties signed by Santa Anna, it seems their willingness to continue the war against Las Californias has waned. They will not embarrass themselves further, and have agreed to let us remain free in exchange for Santa Anna's return. For the moment, this means the war with Mexico is over… whether that peace will continue remains to be seen.

As expected, the Mexican government has refuted the Treaties of San Diego and refused to negotiate for Santa Anna's return. They are, however, evidently afraid that the treaties have enough validity that ignoring them would give the Americans an excuse to intervene - and have called for a ceasefire. How long it will last is unknown, but for the moment Las Californias has its respite.

Not unexpectedly, Mexico has ignored the terms of the Treaties of San Diego - claiming that Santa Anna only agreed to them under duress. Indeed, Santa Anna himself has been quick to back up their claim even despite his precarious position. The one bright light in this? It might be the cause the American government has been looking for to intervene in our war.
Appeal to the Americans for help.
We will fight this out on our own.

Despite the assurances supposedly offered by the Treaties of San Diego, we once again find ourselves at war with Mexico. The ceasefire is, it seems, now over. While many in our government never expected Mexico to live up to the terms of the treaties anyhow, they do suggest that this might be enough cause for the Americans to intervene. Such an intervention would, of course, be inviting the wolves through the front door… but do we have any other choice?
Appeal to the Americans for help.
We will fight this out on our own.

A diplomat has arrived in Washington from California - a part of the Mexican frontier, who rebelled against Mexican tyranny. The diplomat has asked for American intervention in their war, claiming that a treaty had been worked out with Mexico which they then of course immediately refuted. It seems like shaky grounds… but do we turn our backs on them?
Tell them we will do what we can.

Inspired by the success of the Tejas rebellion, liberal malcontents are stirring trouble in Coahuila, Nuevo León and Tamaulipas. The rebels preach for personal freedom and the restitution of the Constitution of 1824, as well as an ultimatum, written by a former Deputy of Tamaulipas named Antonio Canales Rosillo, that has also reached our office… Surrender to the our demands, or we shall go to war.
We will support them! (Play as Rio Grande)
The Original Borders of Las Californias once stretched to the Headwaters of the Colorado River. We must claims these territories we were unable to get a hold of after the revolt of 1836.
The Natural Borders of the Riograndese Republic, past the province of Laredo, should be the Western Bank of the Rio Grande and it shall be so.
The Natural Borders of the Riograndese Republic, past the province of Laredo, should be the Western Bank of the Rio Grande and it shall be so.
Rebels under the command of Antonio Canales, and with the help of Texas, have gathered enough forces to declare themselves independent from Mexican rule!
We have gathered enough rebels to declare our independence from Mexico, who now wish to contest our cries for freedom!

In a surprise development, the leader of Mexico - General Antonio de Santa Anna himself - has been captured. Found running through the countryside, attempting to escape back to Mexico, he has been imprisoned in a $COUNTRY_ADJ$ jail and forced to negotiate. We can force the man to agree to a peace treaty - even though many consider the odds of Santa Anna's own country agreeing to terms exacted under duress to be slight, it may be our only hope against overwhelming odds. At the very least, the humiliation dealt against their leader will be a blow against the Mexican government and one from which they will not soon recover.
Force him to sign the treaty.

In a humiliating blow to Mexico's prestige, General Santa Anna has been captured again! But this time, it happened within $COUNTRY_ADJ$ territory - separated from our army and found wandering the countryside in an attempt to return to Mexico. While imprisoned, he agreed to a series of treaties which recognized $COUNTRY_ADJ$ independence among other guarantees… all in exchange for his safe return. We are now faced with a question: While the treaties are worthless, disregarding them completely could give the Americans a cause to intervene. Either way, one thing is certain: as the architect of this fiasco, Santa Anna's time in power is done.

In a humiliating blow to Mexico's prestige, General Santa Anna has been captured again! But this time, it happened within Riograndese territory - found wandering the countryside in an attempt to return to Mexico. While imprisoned, Santa Anna agreed to a series of treaties which recognized Riograndese independence among other guarantees… All in exchange for his safe return. The question now falls to Mexico whether to honor the Treaties of Ciudad Victoria, obtained under duress, or to refute them.

In a humiliating blow to Mexico's prestige, General Santa Anna has been captured again! But this time, it happened within Riograndese territory - found wandering the countryside in an attempt to return to Mexico. While imprisoned, Santa Anna agreed to a series of treaties in exchange for his safe return.

In a humiliating blow to Mexico's prestige, General Santa Anna has been captured again! But this time, it happened within Riograndese territory. While imprisoned, Santa Anna agreed to a series of treaties in exchange for his safe return.
Honor the treaty and negotiate for Santa Anna's return.
Continue the war. Let the Americans and Texans do as they wish.

While Mexico had every reason to refute the treaties signed by Santa Anna, it seems their willingness to continue the war against Rio Grande has waned. They will not embarrass themselves further, and have agreed to let us remain free in exchange for Santa Anna's return. For the moment, this means the war with Mexico is over… whether that peace will continue remains to be seen.

As expected, the Mexican government has refuted the Treaties of Ciudad Victoria and refused to negotiate for Santa Anna's return. They are, however, evidently afraid that the treaties have enough validity that ignoring them would give the Americans an excuse to intervene - and have called for a ceasefire. How long it will last is unknown, but for the moment Rio Grande has its respite.

Not unexpectedly, Mexico has ignored the terms of the Treaties of Ciudad Victoria - claiming that Santa Anna only agreed to them under duress. Indeed, Santa Anna himself has been quick to back up their claim even despite his precarious position. The one bright light in this? It might be the cause the American government has been looking for to intervene in our war.
Appeal to the Americans for help.
We will fight this out on our own.

Despite the assurances supposedly offered by the Treaties of Ciudad Victoria, we once again find ourselves at war with Mexico. The ceasefire is, it seems, now over. While many in our government never expected Mexico to live up to the terms of the treaties anyhow, they do suggest that this might be enough cause for the Americans to intervene. Such an intervention would, of course, be inviting the wolves through the front door… but do we have any other choice?
Appeal to the Americans for help.
We will fight this out on our own.

A diplomat has arrived in Washington from Rio Grande - a part of the Mexican frontier, who rebelled against Mexican tyranny. The diplomat has asked for American intervention in their war, claiming that a treaty had been worked out with Mexico which they then of course immediately refuted. It seems like shaky grounds… but do we turn our backs on them?
Tell them we will do what we can.
Now that Tejas is back under our rightful control, we should officially rename the region and its provinces to more fitting names.
Now that Texas is back under our rightful control, we should officially rename the region and its provinces to more fitting names.

After Vice President Mirabeau B. Lamar visited the area around Waterloo during a buffalo-hunting expedition in $YEAR$, he proposed that the republic's capital, then located in Houston, be relocated to an area situated on the north bank of the Colorado River. He also proposed that the name Waterloo should be changed to Austin, in honor of Stephen F. Austin, the first secretary of state and the father of our great nation.
An important matter has been brought to our parliament: The recognition of Texas as a sovereign state. $COUNTRY_ADJ$'s response shall be formulated in the days to come.

An important matter has been brought to our parliament: The recognition of Texas as a sovereign state. Will we extend formal recognition of Texas, opening an embassy in their capital and formally establishing relations? The Mexicans will, of course, not approve. Or we could simply denounce them as mere agitators threatening the Mexicos's territorial integrity. A final option would be to stay neutral in the matter, not incurring in the wrath of either party. Whatever the case, we must state our position in the matter.
Denounce Texas and state our support for Mexico
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has decided to formally recognize Texas as a sovereign nation.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has decided to denounce Texas and state their support for Mexico.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has decided to stay neutral in the matter.

Upon having explored several suitable town sites on Buffalo Bayou and Galveston Bay, the Allen brothers -Augustus Chapman and John Kirby- bought from Elizabeth E. Parrott, wife of T.F.L. Parrott and widow of John Austin, the south half of the lower league on the Buffalo Bayou granted to her by her late husband. The Allen brothers named this plot of land Houston, in honor of Presiden Sam Houston, and have been advertising the notional town both on telegraphs and newspapers, and also lobbied the idea to our congress… they wish to designate Houston as the capital of our republic, agreeing to provide a capital building.
By all means, let us move our capital!
We have no need for a new capital.
Comanche Indians are raiding this province
This province is being ravaged by Comanche raiders!

Another nation has recently declared itself independent and rose against Mexican tyranny. This nation can be considered a potential ally and as such, it is our duty for formalize an alliance with them by signing a treaty of friendship, mutual cooperation and a delimitation of our borders in order to avoid future conflicts.

A $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ envoy has reached $CAPITAL$ with a proposal: A treaty of friendship, mutual cooperation and a delimitation of our borders in order to avoid future conflicts with $FROMCOUNTRY$. The $MONARCHTITLE$ of $FROMCOUNTRY$ believes our two nations to be akin to brothers fighting for the same goal: Freedom. Shall we sign this agreement?
It is not in our best interest.
Minor skirmishes are occurring in this area.

Comanches have conducted a devastating raid in Houston, our capital, as retaliation for the killing of one of their Chiefs! Concerns have been raised about the state of the National Archives and their proneness in Houston, a border city with no real defenses. Several Congressmen have suggested moving the Archives to Houston, our former capital, but have been largely ignored.

Mexican forces have been conducting light skirmishes all over our borders, occupying several towns and settlements in the process. Yet again concerns have been raised about the state of our National Archives, whether or not should they be moved to a more secure location in Houston, far away from any possible skirmishes, lest they get destroyed. Both proponents and opponents of this move have ensued in very heated debates, and neither side can reach consensus.
Austin is secure enough, leave them there.
We must secure out National Archives, move them to Houston!

Mexican forces have struck our border settlements at the same time the Comanches were conducting a raid, and both seem to be working in conjunction! This is very worrysome news, again a heated debate has ensued in our Congress concerning the National Archives and their supposedly prone location in Austin… Houston's Faction really wishes to move the Archives to our former capital, where they'd allegedly be more secure, while our more conservative congressmen are calling for an all-out war against Mexico and the Comanches in retaliation for ther transgressions against our Nation, and the reclamation of our rightful territories on the East Bank of the Rio Grande.
No, the archives will remain in Austin.
Fine, move them to a secure location in Houston…
The archives cannot be moved at all costs, retaliate against Mexico and the Comanches!
The Aftermath of the Archives War…

The recent developments concerning the state of our National Archives have been dubbed the 'Archives War', for they nearly torn our country's government appart. We cannot allow such things to happen once more, for the destiny of Texas could very well be threatened… And as the Texan Congress was still in session, the Comanche Indians had struck again, raiding some of the border settlements as it had become customary.
The Aftermath of the Archives War…

The recent developments concerning the state of our National Archives have been dubbed the 'Archives War', for they nearly torn our country's government appart. We cannot allow such things to happen once more, for the destiny of Texas could very well be threatened… May these events serve as a lesson, let the city of Houston be our final Capital and the resting place of the National Archives.
No, take them back to Austin.
Houston is our final capital and the archives shall remain there!

A large party of Comanches, Kiowas, Caddos and Wichitas have conducted a devastating raid in Fort Parker, killing some of its inhabitants and capturing many people! One of the Indians approached the fort with a white flag, but no one believed the flag was genuine… Minutes later, the indian party attacked the fort! Several people managed to escape, but not all were so lucky.

In early $YEAR$ three Comanche emissaries entered San Antonio and asked for peace, offering to send a large contingent of their leaders to secure the treaty… They returned a white boy as a show of sincerity and were asked to free any white captives they had if their intentions were true. This month when the Comanches arrived in San Antonio, while expecting a council of peace, the 12 chiefs had brought women and children as well as warriors. The delegation hopes to negotiate a recognition of the Comancheria, the Comanche Land, as a sovereign state of the Comanche. These chiefs, however, only brought one white captive to the meeting, as well as several Mexican children who had been captured separately. Several chiefs refuse to deliver more captives on the grounds that they were held in the rancherías of other chiefs over which he had no authority over.

When asked about the more than a dozen abducted whites expected to be available for release, Matilda Lockhart, the only captive brought by the Comanches, informed the Texans that she knew only about a Mrs. Webster and her two children and that the Comanche chiefs had decided to ransom them. The Texians believed this was against the conditions for the negotiations, which they insisted had specified that all abducted whites had to be released before the council. The Comanche, of course, had a different view, since the chiefs and bands not in attendance were under no obligation to release anyone, as they had never agreed to a council. What shall be done with this delegation? They clearly did not bring the expected number of captives…
Throw them in jail, perhaps they will negotiate there.
Don't be hasty, we must secure peace with the Indians if Texas is to grow further.

Once the Comanche delegates were taken to jail, the situation escalated and in no time a fight broke out. Texan soldiers opened fire against the Comanches, killing most of them in the process… Outside, the rest of the delegates started loosing arrows and throwing stones after hearing the conmotion outside, killing one texan in the process. When a small number of warriors managed to escape from the Council House, all of the Comanche began to flee. The soldiers who pursued them again opened fire, killing and wounding both Comanche and Texans.  Armed civilians also joined the battle but, claiming they could not always differentiate between warriors and women and children, since all of the Comanche were fighting, shot at them indiscriminately. We must expect future retaliation from the Comanches.

The negotiations have started and the Comanche are willing to coerce all the chiefs to release the white settlers, but only if we, the Government of the Republic of Texas, recognize the Comancheria, the Numunuu Sookobitu or Comanche Land, as the sovereign land of the Comanche which rightfully belongs to them. Mr. $MONARCHTITLE$, what shall we do?
These savages cannot and will not uphold their word, we will not recognize it.
Very well, the lands of the Comanche rightfully belong to them.

Negotiations have broken down and after several hours of heated debates, the Comanches finally leave. We cannot recognize their national entity if their entire nation is unable to unite as a single tribe… Besides, the Comancheria is located among the territories claimed by our great nation, we cannot allow them to claim our lands as well.

Negotiations have broken down and after several hours of heated debates, the Comanches finally leave. While some of the chiefs are clearly not happy, we could tell a majority of them were, and as soon as they left, a big caravan lead by Comanches just arrived in San Antonio… The Comanches have upheld their word and decided to release every single white hostage they had. Some of them are malnourished and others appear to be in shock. Perhaps these people can be trusted? Only time will tell, for now, we know they have upholded their word.

As payback from the slaughtering of the Comanche Peace Delegation, several Comanche chiefs led by War Chief Buffalo Hump were determined to do more than merely complaining about what the Comanches viewed as bitter betrayal. Buffalo Hump gathered a huge raiding party and started raiding $COUNTRY_ADJ$ parties far and wide, devastating many settlements and cities in the process, and raping robbing and pillaging whatever they could get their hands on.

The white man and the red man cannot dwell in harmony together, said President Mirabeau Bonaparte Lamar, "Nature forbids it." Our answer to the 'Indian Problem' is: "to push a rigorous war against them, pursuing them to their hiding places without mitigation or compassion, until they shall be made to feel that flight from our borders without hope of return, is preferable to the scourges of war."

The white man and the red man cannot dwell in harmony together, said our president, citing former Statesman Mirabeau Bonaparte Lamar, "Nature forbids it." Our answer to the 'Indian Problem' is: "to push a rigorous war against them, pursuing them to their hiding places without mitigation or compassion, until they shall be made to feel that flight from our borders without hope of return, is preferable to the scourges of war." We are in position to remove all natives from Texan soil, shall we follow the President's exaple?

In $YEAR$, a number of American immigrants in Alta California raised and rebelled against the local $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government before seizing military control the area to the north of the San Francisco Bay, in the present-day state of California. The immigrants had not been allowed to buy or rent land and had been threatened with expulsion because $COUNTRY_ADJ$ officials were concerned about the incoming influx of unregulated Americans in a climate of quickly rising tensions with the US. The term "California Republic" appeared on the flag the insurgents raised and indicated their aspiration of forming a republican Anglo government for California. The flag featured an image of a California grizzly bear and became known as the Bear Flag and the revolt as the Bear Flag Revolt.

Our position on the North American continent, and our traditional cultural ties to the USA, make it likely that the USA would accept a petition of statehood from us. Doing this means our country will be annexed by the United States. Shall we request statehood or remain independent? Let us decide.

Our position on the North American continent, and our traditional cultural ties to the USA, make it likely that the USA would accept a petition of statehood from us. Doing this means our country will be annexed by the United States. Shall we request statehood or remain independent? Let us decide.
Request statehood, we will not survive alone
Never, we are the masters of our own destiny!
Our country is currently requesting to become a state of the USA.

Disgruntled Conservatives who are staunchly against our annexation to the USA have risen and attempted a coup d'état with the help of England, France and Mexico. They are taking over the Texan Capitol as we speak, and will most likely install themselves as an Anti-American government and revert any attempts to annex our country to the USA. What shall we do about it, MR. $MONARCHTITLE$?

Disgruntled Conservatives who are staunchly against our annexation to the USA have risen and attempted a coup d'état with the help of English, French and Mexican Agents. They took over the Texan Capitol and will most likely installed themselves as an Anti-American government and reverted any attempts to annex their country to the USA.

Our country currently claims a large territory currently held by Mexico and as they have become our new allies, they are willing to follow the decision of our international Arbiter, who might be either England or France.

We have been approached by Texan and Mexican diplomats seeking to solve any and all border frictions between their countries by requesting we act as an impartial arbiter, the destiny of both countries is now on our hands. Let us begin the land partition…
Grant Texas only its original territories.
Grant Texas the Eastern Bank of the Rio Grande, but nothing from Colorado.
Grant Texas all its claimed territories.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has decided to grant Texas only its original territories.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has decided to grant Texas the Eastern Bank of the Rio Grande, but nothing from Colorado.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has decided to grant Texas all its claimed territories.
United Socialist Republics of Texas-Rio Grande
The Union of Texas and Rio Grande

Texas and Rio Grande can be considered brother nations: We both share the same goals and principles, and while our cultures might be different, in the end we share the same destiny. Let us unite in hopes for a better future!
A Main Culture for our Realm.
We must choose a culture representing our union!
A Main Culture for our Realm.
We must choose a culture representing our union!
We must choose a proper capital for our nation!
We must choose a proper capital for our nation!
The people in Northern Mexico have begun referring to themselves as 'Norteño', showing a staunch allegiance to their distinct traditions.
The people in Northern Mexico have begun referring to themselves as 'Norteño', showing a staunch allegiance to their distinct traditions.

Sonora and Sinaloa, two Mexican states with cultural and geographical ties with California, inhabited by people who are far removed from the main Mexican cultural and political centers, could easily be annexed if we wished it so.

The Norteños of Northern Mexico are hardy people who value strength and take pride of their cow-wrangling ways. They, with no doubt, could become full citizens of $COUNTRY$ if we were to protect and embrace their customs and traditions.

The Spanish-speaking Californios of California are hardy people who value strength and take pride of their cow-wrangling ways. They, with no doubt, could become full citizens of $COUNTRY$ if we were to protect and embrace their customs and traditions.

After violence in their home enclave of Nauvoo, Illinois, the Mormons have elected to head west to settle in the Salt Lake Valley where they can practice their faith without hindrance. Led by Brigham Young, the Mormons suffered great hardship but eventually did reach their destination. While these people might be illegally squatting on empty land, we cannot ignore the sheer quantity of migrants the area just got. What shall we do with these people?
Welcome them to their new home.
We have no use for these heathens, expel them.

Disgruntled by not being allowed to remain in the Salt Lake Valley, the adventurous Mormons have undergone yet another exodus, this time to Northern Mexico, more specifically to Chihuahua and Sonora. My $MONARCHTITLE$ what should we do with these people? They wish to form their own autonomous communities in the desert and when approached witht he idea of not being able to remain in Chihuahua and Sonora, the tone of their leaders turned rather hostile, demanding recognition as an autonomous community or else… They shall revolt against our rule.
There is no need for violence, welcome these good folks to their new homes.
Is that so? Then there shall be blood.

Disgruntled by not being allowed to remain in the Salt Lake Valley, the adventurous Mormons have undergone yet another exodus, this time to Columbia. My $MONARCHTITLE$ what should we do with these people? They wish to form their own autonomous communities in the forests and when approached witht he idea of not being able to remain in Columbia, the tone of their leaders turned rather hostile, demanding recognition as an autonomous community or else… They shall revolt against our rule.
There is no need for violence, welcome these good folks to their new homes.
Is that so? Then there shall be blood.

Disgruntled by not being allowed to remain in the Salt Lake Valley, the adventurous Mormons have undergone yet another exodus, this time to the faraway Islands of Hawaii. My liege, this is disastrous, the Mormons are taking over our islands! There is nothing we can do about it other than hoping they are benevolent to our people…

Disgruntled by not being allowed to remain in the Salt Lake Valley, the adventurous Mormons have undergone yet another exodus, this time to the faraway Islands of Hawaii, where they have taken over the archipelago and declared it the sovereign state of Deseret. When or how did they obtain the copious ammount of money needed to move the Mormon migrants accross the sea remains a mystery, but one this is certain: The Mormons arrived in Hawaii with the intention of staying there. The natives are by no means happy and the sudden influx of migrants have brought many diseases and racial tensions, which have decimated the Hawaiians.

Disgruntled by not being allowed to remain in the Salt Lake Valley, the adventurous Mormons have undergone yet another exodus, this time to the faraway Islands of Hawaii, where they have taken over the archipelago and declared it the sovereign state of Deseret.
Disgruntled by not being allowed to remain in the Salt Lake Valley, the adventurous Mormons have undergone yet another exodus, this time to the faraway Islands of Hawaii.

The countries we have signed the treaties of friendship and mutual cooperation with could easily be made into our satellites by signing a decree to let $COUNTRY$ establish a protectorate over their countries as well as letting $COUNTRY_ADJ$ politicians be made advisors who will run their foreign policy. While some might object to this decision, the $MONARCHTITLE$ of $COUNTRY$ believes it is for the best. United we must stand if our small nations are to survive in this savage world.
Our top politicians have signed a bill which will turns us into a $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ protectorate, letting them run our foreign policy.

Aridoamerica, a concept that has been debated among intellectual circles in $COUNTRY$, denotes an ecological and cultural region spanning all of the former Northern Mexico. Because of the relatively hard conditions in this dubbed 'Aridoamerican' area, the peoples living there have developed distinct cultures of substinence farming and free-range ranching. While our languages might be different, our cultures are in the end very similar, giving our top philosophers the idea of a united Aridoamerican county. We are in position to make such ideas into fruition, uniting the hardy peoples of this arid paradise into one country…

Aridoamerica, a concept that has been debated among intellectual circles in $COUNTRY$, denotes an ecological and cultural region spanning all of the former Northern Mexico. Because of the relatively hard conditions in this dubbed 'Aridoamerican' area, the peoples living there have developed distinct cultures of substinence farming and free-range ranching. While our languages might be different, our cultures are in the end very similar, giving our top philosophers the idea of a united Aridoamerican county. After having claimed the states which comprise the proposed Aridoamerica, we are in a very favorable position to become a new real, a place for the hardy peoples of Aridoamerica to call home.
A Main Culture for our Realm.
We must choose a culture representing our union!
A Main Culture for our Realm.
We must choose a culture representing our union!
A Main Culture for our Realm.
We must choose a culture representing our union!
A Main Culture for our Realm.
We must choose a culture representing our union!
A Main Culture for our Realm.
We must choose a culture representing our union!
A Main Culture for our Realm.
We must choose a culture representing our union!
We must choose a proper capital for our nation!
We must choose a proper capital for our nation!

The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Nation has finally been consolidated and our old unitary model of governance makes it nigh-impossible to properly manage the vast expanses of land comprising our country. A heated debate has ensued in $CAPITAL$ and after several days of deliberations, our Statesmen have come to the conclusion that Aridoamerica must follow a federalist model in which every state shall possess a certain degree of autonomy… Our nation must also be restructured in order for this model to work and four states have been proposed: The State of Texas shall be the easternmost state, comprised by the territories claimed by the eponymous state. The State of Rio Grande, comprising the territories on the south and western banks of the Rio Grande and the Sierra Madre. The state of Las Californias, comprised of the territories claimed by the former Alta California. And finally, the state of Sonora, comprising the former Mexican states of Sonora and Sinaloa. With this new model, $COUNTRY_ADJ$shall enjoy a greater degree of autonomy, which translates in more settlers and more towns and cities founded in our nation.
With Deseret secured under $COUNTRY_ADJ$ dominion, a heated debate has ensued in $CAPITAL$ concerning the legal status of the Mormons. Their destiny shall be decided in the upcoming hours…

With Deseret secured under $COUNTRY_ADJ$ dominion, a heated debate has ensued in $CAPITAL$ concerning the legal status of the Mormons. Several dignitaries, both $COUNTRY_ADJ$ and Mormon in origin, have proposed the recognition of Mormons, as well as their customs and religion, as part of $COUNTRY$, arguing that they will facilitate the settling as well as exploitation of the vast natural resources found in Deseret Their origins are also very similar to ours: Settlers and adventurers seeking greater freedom that parted to the unknown and carved their new homes from the untamed wilderness. Both proponents and opponents have been arguing for hours and neither side seems to reach consensus… Ultimately, it is your duty as the $MONARCHTITLE$ of $COUNTRY$ to make the final decision concerning the Mormons, for Deseret will nevertheless become a State of our Federation.
Mormons shall become a part of our nation!
Heathens in our $COUNTRY$? Are you out of your mind?
Upon reinstating the Federal Constitution of 1824, Alta California can once more be an integral part of $COUNTRY$

Alta California is still an autonomous province of Mexico, who wished for the reinstatement of the Federal Constitution of 1824. Since we have denied them of their wishes, they have become a rebellious province and something must be done about it.
It's no use, let them go.

The English-speaking Californians are hardy people who value strength and take pride of their cow-wrangling and gold prospecting ways. They, with no doubt, could become full citizens of $COUNTRY$ if we were to protect and embrace their customs and traditions.

Since our inception as a nation, Texan Statesmen have wished to annex Alta California somehow, in hopes of having access to the Pacific. We, as $COUNTRY$, are now in a favorable position to do so. By laying claims over all the Alta California, we shall have our ports in the Pacific.

Since our inception as a nation, Texan Statesmen have wished to annex Alta California somehow, in hopes of having access to the Pacific. We, as $COUNTRY$, are now in a favorable position to do so. By performing a peaceful coup in California, we shall have our ports in the Pacific.
Now that Alta California is on our hands, we must construct connect Houston and San Francisco, as well as every regional capital inbetween, in order to foment $COUNTRY_ADJ$ trade.
Trade between the Russo-American Company and California must be fomented if our colonies are to grow further and for the wellbeing of our people.
Trade between Columbia and California must be fomented if our colonies are to grow further and for the wellbeing of our people.
Trade between the Russo-American Company and Columbia must be fomented if our colonies are to grow further and for the wellbeing of our people.
The territories which comprise the republics of Texas and Rio Grande could easily be claimed, and united by sword if needed be.

Petsamo is rightfully $COUNTRY_ADJ$, and should use $COUNTRY_ADJ$ names.

The Diplomatic Status of the CSA
An important matter has been brought to our parliament: The recognition of the CSA as a sovereign state. $COUNTRY_ADJ$'s response shall be formulated in the days to come.
The Diplomatic Status of the CSA

An important matter has been brought to our parliament: The recognition of the CSA as a sovereign state. Will we extend formal recognition of the CSA, opening an embassy in their capital and formally establishing relations? The Americans will, of course, not approve. Or we could simply denounce them as mere agitators threatening the USA's territorial integrity. A final option would be to stay neutral in the matter, not incurring in the wrath of either party. Whatever the case, we must state our position in the matter.
Denounce the CSA and state our support for the USA
The Diplomatic Status of the CSA

With our holdings on the mainland lost, all we have left is our stronghold on the island of Formosa. The suggestion among what little remains of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government is that we abandon $CAPITAL$ and move the capital to Taibei. This does not guarantee our safety by any means, but it may be the only means of survival we possess.

One of the long standing problems for shipping on the Far Eastern and India trades has always been the need to round the African Cape in order to actually get there. By establishing a canal through the Suez, we will shorten the journey to Asia by days, as well as perform a wonderful feat of modern engineering. All that remains is to obtain permission from the owners of Suez.
column3: Les routes commerciales entre l'Extrême-Orient et l'Inde ont toujours été handicapées par la nécessité de contourner le Cap. En construisant le canal de Suez, nous raccourcirons de plusieurs jours les voyages à destination de l'Asie et réaliserons par là même une belle prouesse d'ingénierie moderne.
column4: Die Notwendigkeit der Umschiffung der Südspitze Afrikas ist eines der ältesten Probleme für den Schiffsverkehr nach Fernost und Indien. Durch den Bau eines Kanals durch den Isthmus von Suez könnten wir die Fahrzeit nach Asien um mehrere Tage verkürzen und zudem eine glanzvolle Ingenieursleistung vollbringen.
column6: Uno de los antiguos problemas para el comercio naval en el Extremo Oriente y la India ha sido siempre la necesidad de tener que rodear el Cabo de Buena Esperanza para poder llegar allí. Estableciendo un canal a través de Suez, reduciremos el viaje hasta Asia en varios días, además de llevar a cabo una maravillosa proeza de ingeniería moderna.

column2: A diplomat, as well as several entrepreneurs from $FROMCOUNTRY$, have come to $COUNTRY$ wish a proposition: Establishing a canal through the Suez Isthmus which will shorten the journey to Asia by days, as well as perform a wonderful feat of modern engineering which will bring much prestige to $COUNTRY$. They wish to obtain a land concession on Suez so the planning and construction of said canal can be started. My $MONARCHTITLE$, what shall we do about this?
Very well, we shall concede permission.
It is not in our best interest.
The Suez Canal, a response from $FROMCOUNTRY$
$FROMCOUNTRY$ states that it is not in their best interest to allow $COUNTRY_ADJ$ meddling in their sovereign territories.

Proposals for a Canal across the Panama Isthmus probably date back to the first discovery of the area. Nowhere is the strip of land that unites the North and South American continents thinner than here, and, with the aid of modern engineering, we could shorten the travel time between the Atlantic and The Pacific by several days by building it. All that remains is to obtain permission from the owners of Panama.
column3: Les propositions de construction d'un canal à travers le détroit de Panama remontent probablement à la première découverte de la région. Nulle part ailleurs une bande de terre reliant les continents nord et sud américains n'est aussi étroite qu'à cet endroit et, grâce à l'ingénierie moderne, nous pourrions raccourcir de plusieurs jours les voyages entre les océans Atlantique et Pacifique.
column4: Die Vorschläge für den Bau eines Kanals durch den Isthmus von Panama reichen wahrscheinlich bis zur Entdeckung des Gebiets zurück. Nirgendwo ist die Landverbindung zwischen dem nord- und südamerikanischen Kontinent dünner als hier, und durch den Einsatz modernen Ingenieurswissen könnten wir die Fahrzeit vom Atlantik in den Pazifik um mehrere Tage reduzieren.
column6: Las propuestas de construcción de un canal a través del Istmo de Panamá probablemente se remonten al primer descubrimiento del área. Se trata del lugar donde la franja de tierra que une los continentes del norte y el sur de América es más fina y, con la ayuda de la ingeniería moderna, podemos recortar en varios días la duración del viaje entre el Atlántico y el Pacífico.

column2: A diplomat, as well as several entrepreneurs from $FROMCOUNTRY$, have come to $COUNTRY$ wish a proposition: Establishing a canal through the Panama Isthmus which will join the Pacific and Atlantic Oceans, as well as performing a wonderful feat of modern engineering which will bring much prestige to $COUNTRY$. They wish to obtain a land concession on Balboa so the planning and construction of said canal can be started. My $MONARCHTITLE$, what shall we do about this?
Very well, we shall concede permission.
It is not in our best interest.
The Panama Canal, a response from $FROMCOUNTRY$
$FROMCOUNTRY$ states that it is not in their best interest to allow $COUNTRY_ADJ$ meddling in their sovereign territories.
We own the Volga-Don Canal, linking the Black Sea and the Caspian Sea, and we receive the dividends of its toll and glory for its possession.
Building a canal which will link the Black Sea with the Caspian Sea would be a tremendous boon to our shipping, and we are in a position to build one in Tsaritsyn.

Today we will start building the Canal to access the Caspian Sea. Our engineers are ready and a series of surveys of the area of the canal were done. The only thing left to do before we start the construction is define the budget of this colossal project. \n \n This promises to be one massive undertaking and when finished it will be, without a doubt, one of the biggest human achievements for decades to come.
Allow them to have as much money as they need.
Invest a little more than they asked for.
Give them as much as they asked for.
The Construction of the Volga-Don Canal is Finished

The canal took years and thousands of workers to be built but today on $YEAR$, the canal was officially opened by the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ ruler for transiting from Rostov-on-Don to Astrakhan. The next day, a ceremony was held in Astrakhan where the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ ruler laid the final stone.
Building a canal which will link the Black Sea with the Caspian Sea would be a tremendous boon to our shipping, and we are in a position to build one in Tsaritsyn.

A combination of commercial and naval interests have led $COUNTRY$ to the idea of constructing an artificial waterway that'd allow vessels to travel from the Black sea to the Caspian Sea. The 91 miles long canal is being built and is expected to quickly become one of the busiest artificial waterways of the world. The project offers new impetus to commerce for Persia and the Eastern Caucasus, and proves that nation's greatness can be achieved through manufacture, trade and engineering rather than through war and conquest.

The 91 miles long canal is being built and is expected to quickly become one of the busiest artificial waterways of the world.
